entry.citation: Ibn al-Muqriʼ, Ismāʻīl b. Abī Bakr 2013

reference.div: Ibn al-Muqriʼ, Ismāʻīl b. Abī Bakr 2013. Iršād al-ġāwī ilā Masālik al-ḥāwī, ed. Walīd b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Rubayʻī (Ǧidda: Dār al-Minhāǧ li-al-Našr wa-al-Tawzīʻ, 2013).

entry.citation: Ibn al-Muqrī’, Ismāʻīl b. Abī Bakr 1305

reference.div: Ibn al-Muqrī’, Ismāʻīl b. Abī Bakr 1305. Maǧmūʻ al-qāḍī al-fāḍil al-imām al-ʻallāma Šaraf al-Dīn Ismāʻīl b. Abī Bakr al-Muqrī’ (Būmbāy: Maṭbaʻa Nuḫbat al-aḫbār, 1305).
Ibn al-Mutafannina, Muḥammad b. ʻAlī 1340. Matn al-raḥbiyya fī ʻilm al-farā’iḍ (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat al-Manār, 1340).

entry.citation: Ibn al-Naqīb, Aḥmad b. Lu’lu’ b. ʻAbd Allāh al-Rūmī 1357

reference.div: Ibn al-Naqīb, Aḥmad b. Lu’lu’ b. ʻAbd Allāh al-Rūmī 1357. ʻUmdat al-sālik wa-ʻuddat al-nāsik wa-bi-hāmišihi taʻlīqāt li-baʻḍ al-ʻulamā’ al-ṯiqāt, ed. Aḥmad Saʻd ʻAlī (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1357).
Ibn al-Qāṣiḥ, ʻAlī b. ʻUṯmān 1954. Sirāǧ al-qāri’ al-mubtadī wa-tiḏkār al-muqri’ al-muntahī (Cairo: Šarikat wa-maktabat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1954).
Ibn al-Wardī 1939. Ḫarīdat al-ʻaǧā’ib wa-farīdat al-ġarā’ib (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1939).
Ibn al-Ǧawzī n.d. Manāqib Maʻrūf al-Karḫī wa-aḫbāruhu, ed. ʻAbd Allāh al-Ǧabbūrī (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kitāb al-ʻarabī, ).
Ibn al-Ǧazarī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 1349. al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1349).
Ibn al-ʻArabī 1329. al-Futūḥāt al-makkiyya (Cairo: Dār al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya al-kubrā, 1329).
Ibn al-ʻArabī 2007. A prayer for spiritual elevation and protection: al-Dawr al-aʻlā (Ḥizb al-wiqāya), eds Suha Taji-Farouki and Muhyiddin Ibn ʻArabi Society (Oxford: Anqa, 2007).

entry.citation: Ibn al-ʻArabī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. ʻAlī b. Muḥammad b. al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭā’ī and al-Ḍabbā‘,‘Alī b. Muḥammad b. Ḥasan b. Ibrāhīm ١٣٦٨

reference.div: Ibn al-ʻArabī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. ʻAlī b. Muḥammad b. al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭā’ī and al-Ḍabbā‘,‘Alī b. Muḥammad b. Ḥasan b. Ibrāhīm ١٣٦٨. Maǧmūʻat sāʻat al-ḫabar, taštamil ʻalā ḥikam al-sabaʻa al-aflāk, wa-maʻrifat asmā’ al-burūḥ wa-maʻrifat manāzil al-qamr, wa-ḥirz sayyidinā Sulaymān b. Dawūd wa-baḫūrāt al-kawākib al-sabaʻa, wa-kaṯīr min al-fawā’id al-mubāraka ma’ḫūḏa ʻan sayyidinā Muḥyī al-Dīn b. al-ʻArabī (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat Mustafā Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-awlādihi bi-Miṣr, ١٣٦٨).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻAbbād, Muḥammad b. Ibrāhīm and al-Šarqāwī, ʻAbd Allāh b. Ḥiǧāzī 1331

reference.div: Ibn ʻAbbād, Muḥammad b. Ibrāhīm and al-Šarqāwī, ʻAbd Allāh b. Ḥiǧāzī 1331. Šarḥ al-ʻālim ... al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafzī al-Rundī ʻalā matn al-Ḥikam li-al-imām ... al-Sikandarī ... wuḍiʻa ʻalā hāmiš hāḏa al-šarḥ Šarḥ al-muḥaqqiq ... ʻAbd Allāh al-Šarqāwī (Miṣr: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, 1331).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻAllān, Muḥammad al-Ṣiddīqī and al-Nawawī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā 1385

reference.div: Ibn ʻAllān, Muḥammad al-Ṣiddīqī and al-Nawawī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā 1385. Dalīl al-fāliḥīn li-ṭuruq Riyāḍ al-ṣāliḥīn ... wuḍiʻa bi-aʻlā al-ṣaḥā’if kitāb Riyāḍ al-ṣāliḥīn, ed. Maḥmūd Ḥasan Rabīʻ (Miṣr: Šarikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1385).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻAllān, Muḥammad b. ʻAllān al-Ṣiddīqī and al-Nawawī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā s.a.

reference.div: Ibn ʻAllān, Muḥammad b. ʻAllān al-Ṣiddīqī and al-Nawawī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā s.a. al-Futūḥāt al-rabbāniyya ʻalā al-aḏkār al-nawāwiyya ... wa-qad wuḍiʻa bi-aʻlā kull ṣafḥa mā yaḫuṣṣuhā min kitāb Ḥilyat al-abrār wa-šiʻār al-aḫyār fī talḫīṣ al-daʻwāt wa-al-aḏkār (s.l.: al-Maktaba al-Islāmiyya, s.a.).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻAqīl, ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān and Muḥammad Muḥyī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd 1381

reference.div: Ibn ʻAqīl, ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān and Muḥammad Muḥyī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd 1381. Šarḥ Ibn ʻAqīl ... ʻalā Alfiyyat ... Ibn Mālik ... wa-maʻahu kitāb Minḥat al-ǧalīl bi-taḥqīq šarḥ Ibn ʻAqīl, ed. Muḥammad Muḥyī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-tiǧāriyya al-kubrā, 1381).

Ibn ʻArabī n.d. Maǧmūʻat aḥzāb wa-awrād al-Shayḫ al-akbar Ibn ʻArabī Muḥyī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī (...), eds al-Shayḫ Ḫawāǧa Aḥmad Ḍiyā’ al-Dīn Afandī Kumušḫānawī and al-Shayḫ al-Duktūr ʻĀṣim Ibrāhīm al-Kayyālī al-Ḥusaynī al-Šāḏilī al-Darqāwī (Bayrūt: Kitāb – Nāshirūn, n.d.).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻArabī, Muḥyī al-Dīn and al-Ǧurǧānī, ʻAlī b. Muḥammad 1845

reference.div: Ibn ʻArabī, Muḥyī al-Dīn and al-Ǧurǧānī, ʻAlī b. Muḥammad 1845. Kitāb al-taʻrīfāt & Iṣṭilāḥāt al-ṣūfiyya: Definitiones viri meritissimi sejjid Scherif Ali ben Mohammed Dschordchani, Accedunt Definitiones theodophi Mohji-ed-Din Mohammed ben Ali vulgo Ibn Arabi dicti, ed. Gustav Flügel (Leipzig: F.C.G. Vogel, 1845).
Ibn ʻArabī, Muḥyī al-Dīn n.d. Qur’at al-ṭuyūr li-istiḫrāǧ al-fāl wa-al-ḍamīr (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat Mustafā Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-awlādihi bi-Miṣr, ).
Ibn ʻAṭā’ Allāh al-Iskandarī 1931. al-Tanwīr fī isqāṭ al-tadbīr wa Tāǧ al-ʻarūs al-ḥāwī li-tahḏīb al-nufūs (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Azhariyya, 1931).
Ibn ʻAẓẓūm al-Qayrawānī 1317. Kitāb al-Ṣalāt al-Zakiyya ʻalā Nabiyynā Ḫayr al-Barriyya (Makka: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Mīriyya, 1317).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻImād, ʻAbd al-Ḥayy b. Aḥmad 1406

reference.div: Ibn ʻImād, ʻAbd al-Ḥayy b. Aḥmad 1406. Šaḏarāt al-ḏahab fī aḫbār man ḏahab, ed. Maḥmūd al-Arnā’ūṭ (Bayrūt - Dimašq: Dār Ibn Kaṯīr, 1406).

entry.citation: Ibn ʻIrāq, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. Muḥammad al-Kinānī 1964

reference.div: Ibn ʻIrāq, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. Muḥammad al-Kinānī 1964. Tanzīh al-šarīʻa al-marfūʻa ʻan al-aḥādīṯ al-šanīʻa al-mawḍūʻa, eds ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ʻAbd al-Laṭīf and al-Sayyid ʻAbd Allāh b. al-Ṣiddīq al-Ġumārī (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Qāhira, 1964).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytami and al-Suyūṭī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1325

reference.div: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytami and al-Suyūṭī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1325. al-Fatāwī al-ḥadīṯiyya wa-bi-hāmišihi kitāb al-Durar al-muntaṯira fī al-aḥādīṯ al-muštahira (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya, 1325).

Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī 1308. al-Sawāʻiq al-Muḥriqa fī al-Radd ʻalā Ahl al-Bidaʻ wa al-Zandaqa wa bi-Hamišihi Kitāb Taṭhīr al-Ǧinān wa al-Lisān ʻan al-Ḫuṭūr wa al-Tafawwuh bi-Ṯalb Sayyidina Muʻāwiya b. Abī Sufiyān (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻa al-ʻĀmiriyya, 1308).

Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī 1347. Fatḥ al-ǧawād bi-šarḥ al-Iršād li-šayḫ al-islām [...] Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Šihāb al-Dīn b. Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī [...] wa-bi-al-hāmiš Ḥāšiyat Fatḥ al-ǧawād li-šarḥ al-Iršād li-al-ʻallāma Ibn Ḥaǧar al-maḏkūr wa-ġayrihi mumayyaza bi-ǧadwal fawqahā (Miṣr: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1347).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī and Bā Faḍl al-Ḥaḍramī 1338

reference.div: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī and Bā Faḍl al-Ḥaḍramī 1338. Šarḥ al-ʻallāma Šihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad b. Ḥaǧar al-Haytami al-Makkī al-Šāfiʻī ʻalā Muḫtaṣar al-ʻallāma al-faqīh ʻAbd Allāh Bā Faḍl al-Ḥaḍramī ... wa-bi-hāmišihi al-Muḫtaṣar al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: Dār Iḥyā’ al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya, 1338).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. Muḥammad 1035

reference.div: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. Muḥammad 1035. Fatḥ al-ǧawād bi-šarḥ al-Iršād wa-bi-hāmišihi Ḥāšiyat Fatḥ al-ǧawād li-al-šāriḥ (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-maymaniyya, 1035).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. Muḥammad 1930

reference.div: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. Muḥammad 1930. Fatḥ al-mubīn li-šarḥ al-arbaʻīn (Dār Iḥyā’ al-kutub al-ʻArabiyya, 1930).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad and Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnāwī 1307

reference.div: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad and Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnāwī 1307. Šarḥ (2) al-imām Šihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad b. Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī ʻalā matn al-hamziyya fī madḥ ḫayr al-barriyya... wa-bi-hāmišihi Ḥāšiya li-Šayḫ al-islām ... Sayyidī Muḥammad al-Ḥifnī (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ḫayriyya, 1307).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad and Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnāwī 1323

reference.div: Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad and Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnāwī 1323. Šarḥ al-imām Šihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad b. Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī ʻalā matn al-hamziyya fī madḥ ḫayr al-barriyya ... wa-bi-hāmišihi Ḥāšiya li-Šayḫ al-islām ... Sayyidī Muḥammad al-Ḥifnī (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-maymaniyya, 1323).
Ibn Ḥaǧar al-ʻAsqalānī 1352. Bulūġ al-marām min adillat al-aḥkām, ed. Muḥammad Ḥāmid al-Faqī (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-tiǧāriyya al-kubrā, 1352).
Ibn Ḥaǧar al-ʻAsqalānī 1352. Bulūg al-marām min adillat al-aḥkām, ed. Muḥammad Ḥāṣir al-Fiqī? (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 1352).
Ibn Ḥaǧar al-ʻAsqalānī n.d. Bulūġ al-marām (3) min adillat al-aḥkām, ed. Muḥammad Ḥāmid al-Faqī (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-tiǧāriyya al-kubrā, ).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥiǧǧa al-Ḥamawī, Taqī al-Dīn Abū Bakr b. ʻAlī b. Muḥammad al-Qādirī al-Ḥanafī n.d.

reference.div: Ibn Ḥiǧǧa al-Ḥamawī, Taqī al-Dīn Abū Bakr b. ʻAlī b. Muḥammad al-Qādirī al-Ḥanafī n.d. Ṯamarāt al-awrāq fī al-muḥāḍarāt (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-tiǧāriyya al-kubrā, ).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1963

reference.div: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1963. Hudā al-sārī muqaddimat Fatḥ al-bārī (Cairo: Širkat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1963).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī and al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl 1300

reference.div: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī and al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl 1300. Fatḥ al-bārī bi-šarḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Buḫārī (2) (Būlāq, al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻat Būlāq al-Kubrā, 1300).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī and al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Ibrāhīm 1424

reference.div: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī and al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Ibrāhīm 1424. Fatḥ al-bārī bi-šarḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Buḫārī, eds ʻAbd al-Bāqī, Muḥammad Fu’ād and Ibn Bāz, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz b. ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān (Bayrūt: Dār al-kutub al-ʻilmiyya, 1424).

entry.citation: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī and al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Ibrāhīm 1959

reference.div: Ibn Ḥāǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad b. ʻAlī and al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Ibrāhīm 1959. Fatḥ al-bārī bi-šarḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Buḫārī (3) (Cairo: Širkat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1959).
Ibn Ḫuzayma, Muḥammad b. Isḥāq 1968. al-Tawḥīd wa-iṯbāt ṣifāt al-rabb ʻazza wa-ǧalla, ed. Muḥammad Ḫalīl Harrās (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Kulliyya al-Azhariyya, 1968).

entry.citation: Ibn Ṭā’ūs, ʻAlī b. Mūsā b. Ǧaʻfar b. Muḥammad 1414

reference.div: Ibn Ṭā’ūs, ʻAlī b. Mūsā b. Ǧaʻfar b. Muḥammad 1414. Muhaǧ al-daʻawāt wa-manhaǧ al-ʻibādāt (Bayrūt: Mu’assasa al-A‘lamī li’l-Maṭbū‘āt, 1414).

entry.citation: Ibrāhīm b. Idrīs al-Sanūsī al-Ḥusaynī al-Fāsī 1301

reference.div: Ibrāhīm b. Idrīs al-Sanūsī al-Ḥusaynī al-Fāsī 1301. Sayf al-Naṣr bi-al-Sādāt al-Kirām Ahl Badr (al-Iskandariyya: Ṯaġr al-Iskandariyya, 1301).

Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad al-Bāǧūrī 1999. Ḥāšiyat al-Šayḫ Ibrāhīm al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā Šarḥ al-ʻAllāma Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī ʻalā matn al-Šayḫ Abī Šuǧāʻ, ed. Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Salām Šāhīn (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 1999).

entry.citation: Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad al-Bāǧūrī and Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī 1343

reference.div: Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad al-Bāǧūrī and Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī 1343. Ḥāšiyat al-ʻallāma al-fāḍil wa-al-qudwa al-kāmil al-šayḫ Ibrāhīm al-Bāǧūrī ‘alā Šarḥ Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī ‘alā matn Abī Šuǧā‘ fī maḏhab al-imām al-Šāfi‘ī wa-bi-al-hāmiš al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1343).

entry.citation: Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad al-Bāǧūrī and Ḫālid al-Azharī 1344

reference.div: Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad al-Bāǧūrī and Ḫālid al-Azharī 1344. Ḥāšiyat ... Ibrāhīm al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā matn al-Burda (2) ... wa-bi-hāmišihā Šarḥ al-Šayḫ Ḫālid al-Azharī ʻalā al-Burda ayḍan (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maḥmūdiyya al-tiǧāriyya, 1344).

entry.citation: Ibrāhīm b. ʻAbd Allāh Inyās al-Kawlaḫī 2010

reference.div: Ibrāhīm b. ʻAbd Allāh Inyās al-Kawlaḫī 2010. al-Bayān wa-al-tabyīn ʻan al-tiǧāniyya wa-al-tiǧāniyyīn (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Ḥusām li-al-Našr wa-al-Tawzīʻ, 2010).

entry.citation: Ibrāhīm b. ʻAbd Allāh Rafīda et al. 1986

Nunc denuo ab ipso Autore revisum ac emendatum, plurimisque novis radicibus & derivatis, nec non nominibus propriis auctum, Ut in Praefatione pluribus dicetur. Editio secunda. Accedit Index latinus copiosissimus, Qui vicem Lexici Latino-Aethiopici praestare possit (Francofurti ad Moenum: Prostat apud Johannem David Zunnerum. Typis & sumtibus Autoris impressit Mart. Jacquet, 1699).

Ludolf, H. 1701. መጽሐፈ፡ መዝሙራት፡ ዘዳዊት — Psalterium Davidis aethiopice et latine cum duobus impressis & tribus MSStis codicibus diligenter collatum & emendatum, nec non variis lectionibus & notis philologicis illustratum, ut in præfatione pluribus dicetur. Accedunt Æthiopicè tantùm Hymni et Orationes aliquot Vet. et Novi Testamenti, item Canticum Canticorum, cum variis lectionibus & notis (Francofurti ad Moenum: prostat apud Johannem David Zunner et Nicolaum Wilhelmum Helwig, 1701).

Ludolf, H. 1702. ዘኢዮብ፡ ሉዶልፍ፡ ዘእምብሔረ፡ ገርማንያ፡ እንተ፡ ይብልዋ፡ አሌማኛ፡ ትምህርተ፡ ልሳነ፡ ግዕዝ፡ እንተ፡ ይእቲ፡ ልሳነ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘኢትዮጵያ። Hoc est: Iobi Ludolfi grammatica Aethiopica. Ap ipso Autore solicite revisa, & plurimis in locis correcta et aucta. Muḥammad al-Zanātī 1375. al-Faṣl fī uṣūl ʻilm al-raml (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat Mustafā Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-awlādihi bi-Miṣr, 1375).

entry.citation: Muḥammad al-Širbīnī al-Ḫaṭīb and al-Nawāwī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā b. Šaraf s.a.

reference.div: Muḥammad al-Širbīnī al-Ḫaṭīb and al-Nawāwī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā b. Šaraf s.a. Muġnī al-muḥtāǧ (2) ilā maʻrifat maʻānī alfāẓ al-Minhāǧ ... wa-bi-hāmišihi matn al-Minhāǧ al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, s.a.).

entry.citation: Muḥammad al-ʻArabī b. al-Sā’iḥ and Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ṣaġīr al-Šinǧīṭī al-Tišītī 1326

reference.div: Muḥammad al-ʻArabī b. al-Sā’iḥ and Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ṣaġīr al-Šinǧīṭī al-Tišītī 1326. Kitāb Buġyat al-mustafīd li-šarḥ Munyat al-murīd [...] wa-qad ulḥiqa bihi Sirriyyat al-ḥaqq wa-al-intiṣār wa-al-ḏabb ʻan awliyā’ Allāh al-aḫyār wa-bi-hāmišihā Kitāb al-Ǧayš al-kafīl bi-aḫḏ al-nār mimman salla ʻalā al-šayḫ al-Tiǧānī sayf al-inkār (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-Taqaddum al-ʻilmiyyya, 1326).

entry.citation: Muḥammad al-Ḥasan b. ʻAlawī b. ʻAbbās al-Mālikī n.d.

reference.div: Muḥammad al-Ḥasan b. ʻAlawī b. ʻAbbās al-Mālikī n.d. Huwa Allāh.
Muḥammad al-Ḥasan ʻAlawī al-Mālikī 1387. al-Ǧazr wa-al-madd fī aḥkām al-ǧadd (Ḥaydarābād al-Dakkan: Maǧlis Dā’rat al-Maʻārif al-ʻUṯmāniyya, 1387).
Muḥammad al-Ḫudarī 1320. Ḥāšiyat Muḥammad al-Ḫuḍarī ʻalā Šarḥ Ibn ʻAqīl ʻalā Alfiyyat Ibn Mālik (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Šarafiyya, 1320).

entry.citation: Muḥammad al-Ṣaġīr al-Šinqīṭī and al-ʻArabī b. al-Sā’iḥ 1356

reference.div: Muḥammad al-Ṣaġīr al-Šinqīṭī and al-ʻArabī b. al-Sā’iḥ 1356. Buġyat al-mustafīd li-šarḥ Munyat al-murīd - al-Ǧayš al-Kafīl bi-aḫḏ al-nār mimman salla ʻalā al-šayx al-Tiǧānī sayf al-inkār - maʻa taḏayyulihi bi’l-Qaṣīda al-fayḥā’ wa al-rawḍā al-Ġinā’ al-mulaqqaba bi-Sirriyat al-Ḥaqq wa al-intiṣār wa al-ḏabb ʻan awliyā’ Allh al-aḫiyār (al-Qāhira: al-Maktaba al-Tiǧāriyya al-Kubrā - Muṣṭafā Muḥammad, 1356).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr Ibn Qayyim al-Jawziyya 1952

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr Ibn Qayyim al-Jawziyya 1952. al-Wābil al-ṣayyib min al-kalam al-ṭayyib (Cairo: Dār al-zaynā li-al-ṭabaʻ wa-al-našr, 1952).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr al-Šillī Bāʻalawī 1319

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr al-Šillī Bāʻalawī 1319. Kitāb al-mašraʻ al-rawī fī manāqib al-Sāda al-Kirām Āl Abī ʻAlawī (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ʻĀmira al-Šarafiyya, 1319).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Ramlī et al. 1357

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Ramlī, ʻAlī b. ʻAlī Šabrāmallisī, Aḥmad b. ʻAbd al-Razzāq Maġribī, and Nawawī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakariyyā’ 1357. Nihāyat al-muḥtāǧ ilā šarḥ al-Minhāǧ fī al-fiqh ʻalā maḏhab al-Imām al-Šāfiʻī wa-maʻahu Ḥāšiyat Abī al-Ḍiyā’ Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī b. ʻAlī al-Šabrāmallisī wa-bi-al-hāmiš Ḥāšiyat Aḥmad b. ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-maʻrūf bi-al-Maġribī al-Rašīdī (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1357).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Ramlī et al. 197 AD

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Ramlī, Aḥmad b. Ḥiǧāzī al-Fašnī, and Ibn Raslān al-Ramlī 197 AD. Šarḥ al-Zubad Ġāyat al-bayān li-Šams al-Dīn Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Ramlī wa-bi-hāmišihi Mawāhib al-ṣamad fī ḥall alfāẓ al-Zubad li-al-Šayḫ Aḥmad b. Ḥiǧāzī al-Fašnī (Miṣr: ʻĪsā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 197 AD).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Širbīnī and Sulaymān b. Muḥammad al-Baǧīramī 1329

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Širbīnī and Sulaymān b. Muḥammad al-Baǧīramī 1329. Ḥāšiyat ḫātimat al-muhaqqiqīn ... al-Šayḫ Sulaymān al-Baǧīramī al-musammā bi-Tuḥfat al-ḥabīb ʻalā šarḥ al-Ḫaṭīb al-musammā bi-al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Šuǧāʻ wa-bi-hāmišihā al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, 1329).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Širbīnī and Sulaymān b. Muḥammad al-Baǧīramī 1951

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Širbīnī and Sulaymān b. Muḥammad al-Baǧīramī 1951. Baǧīramī ʻalā al-Ḫaṭīb: ḥāšiyat ḫātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn wa-ʻumdat al-a’imma al-mudaqqiqīn: al-musammā bi-Tuḥfat al-ḥabīb ʻalā šarḥ al-Ḫaṭīb al-maʻrūf bi-al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Šuǧāʻ li-al-Šayḫ Muḥammad al-Širbīnī al-ḫaṭīb al-mawǧūd bi-al-hāmiš (Cairo: Šarikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1951).
Muḥammad b. Aḥmad Ḏahabī 2000. The great sins = al-Kabā’ir (Inǧilīzī) (Ryadh: International Islamic Publishing House, 2000).
Muḥammad b. Hiba al-Makkī 1327. Kitāb Ḥadā’iq al-fuṣūl wa-ǧawāhir al-ʻaqūl (S. L: 1327).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Amīr et al. 1368

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Amīr, ʻAbd al-Salām al-Mālikī, and al-Laqānī 1368. Ḥāšīyat al-Šayḫ Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Amīr ʻAlā Šarḥ al-Šayḫ ʻAbd al-Salām b. Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī li-Ǧawharat al-Tawḥīd li’l-Imām al-Laqānī wa bi-Hāmišihā Itḥāf al-Murīd Šarḥ al-Šāyḫ ʻAbd al-Salām al-Mālikī ʻalā Ǧawharat al-Tawḥīd, eds Muḥammad Amīn ʻImrān and Rustom Muṣṭafā al-Ḥalabī (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1368).
Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ġazālī 2007. Iḥyā’ ʻulūm al-dīn (Cairo: Dār al-Salām, 2007).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ġazālī et al. 1352

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ġazālī, ʻAbd al-Qādir b. Šayḫ b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Šayḫ b. ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAydarūs Bā ʻAlawī, al-Suhrawardī, ʻUmar b. Muḥammad, and al-Ḥāfiẓ al-ʻIrāqī, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. al-Ḥusayn 1352. Iḥyā’ ʻulūm al-dīn - wa-maʻahu kitāb al-Muġnī ʻan ḥaml al-asfār fī al-isfār - wa-bi-hāmišihi ṯalāṯa kutub: (1) Taʻrīf al-aḥyā’ bi-faḍā’il al-iḥyā’, (2) al-Imlā’ ʻan iškalāt al-Iḥyā’, (3) ʻAwārif al-maʻārif (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ʻUṯmaniyya al-Miṣriyya, 1352).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ġazālī et al. s.a.

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ġazālī, ʻAbd al-Qādir b. Šayḫ b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Šayḫ b. ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAydarūs Bā ʻAlawī, al-Suhrawardī, ʻUmar b. Muḥammad, and al-Ḥāfiẓ al-ʻIrāqī, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. al-Ḥusayn s.a. Iḥyā’ ʻulūm al-dīn ... wa-bi-ḏaylihi kitāb al-Muġnī ʻan ḥaml al-asfār fī al-isfār ... wa-tamāman li-al-nafʻ alhaqnā bi-al-kitāb fi āḫirihi ṯalāṯa kutub: (1) Taʻrīf al-aḥyā’ bi-faḍā’il al-iḥyā’, (2) al-Imlā’ ʻan iškalāt al-Iḥyā’, (3) ʻAwārif al-maʻārif (Cairo: al-Maktaba al-tiǧāriyya al-kubrā, s.a.).
Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Širbīnī 2000. Muġnī al-muḥtāǧ ilā maʻrifat maʻānī alfāẓ al-Minhāǧ, eds ʻAlī Muḥammad Muʻawwaḍ and ʻĀdil Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Mawǧūd (Bayrūt: Dār al-kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2000).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Širbīnī and al-Nawāwī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā 1329

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Širbīnī and al-Nawāwī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā 1329. Muġnī al-muḥtāǧ ʻalā matn al-Minhāǧ: bi-hāmišihi matn al-Minḥāǧ (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya / Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, 1329).

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. Imām al-Kāmiliyya, Muṣṭafā Maḥmūd al-Azharī, and ʻAbd al-Malik b. ʻAbd Allāh Imām al-Ḥaramayn al-Ǧuwaynī 2008. Šarḥ al-Waraqāt fī ʻilm uṣūl al-fiqh, Silsilat rasā’il uṣūliyya, 5 (al-Riyāḍ: Dār Ibn al-Qayyim, 2008).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. al-Ḥasan b. ʻAbd Allāh al-Tiǧānī n.d.

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. al-Ḥasan b. ʻAbd Allāh al-Tiǧānī n.d. Itḥaf al-ḫall al-wafī bi-šarḥ alfāẓ al-ḥizb al-sayfī (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Qāhira li’l-Ṭibāʻa wa al-Našr, ).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Qāsim al-Ġazzī al-Šāfiʻī and Abū Šūǧāʻ, Aḥmad b. al-Ḥusayn al-Iṣfahānī 1952

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Qāsim al-Ġazzī al-Šāfiʻī and Abū Šūǧāʻ, Aḥmad b. al-Ḥusayn al-Iṣfahānī 1952. Fatḥ al-qarīb al-muǧīb šarḥ Muḥammad b. Qāsim al-Ġazzī al-Šāfiʻī ʻalā al-kitāb al-musamma bi’l-Taqrīb, ed. Aḥmad Saʻd ʻAlī (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Babī al-Ḥalabī wa Awlādihi, 1952).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Qāsim Ġazzī and Aḥmad b. al-Ḥusayn Abū Šuǧāʻ al-Iṣfahānī 2012

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Qāsim Ġazzī and Aḥmad b. al-Ḥusayn Abū Šuǧāʻ al-Iṣfahānī 2012. Šarḥ Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī: al-musammā Fatḥ al-qarīb al-muǧīb fī šarḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb, ed. Aḥmad Maḥmūd Abū Ḥasūba (Cairo: Dār al-Faḍīla, 2012).
Muḥammad b. Sulaymān al-Rūdānī 1408. Ṣilat al-ḫalaf bi-mawṣūl al-ṣalaf, ed. Muḥammad Ḥaǧǧī (Bayrūt: Dār al-ġarb al-islāmī, 1408).
Muḥammad b. Sulaymān al-Ǧazūlī 2005. Dalā’il al-ḫayrāt, ed. Osman Şâkir (Istanbul: Misvâk Neşriyat, 2005).
Muḥammad b. Sīrīn n.d. Taʻbīr al-ru’yā li-al-ḥabr al-Imām wa-al-ǧahbaḏ al-himām al-ustāḏ Muḥammad b. Sīrīn (Cairo: al-Maktaba al-Mulūkiyya, ).

Muḥammad b. Yaḥyā al-Tādifī al-Ḥanbalī 1317. Qalā’id al-Ǧawāhir fī manāqib al-šayḫ ʻAbd al-Qādir al-fard al-ǧāmiʻ al-rabbānī al-haykal al-lāmiʻ al-nūrānī sayydinā al-Šayḫ Muḥīy al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya / Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1317).

Muḥammad b. Yaḥyā al-Tādifī al-Ḥanbalī 1331. Qalā’id al-Ǧawāhir fī manāqib al-šayḫ ʻAbd al-Qādir al-fard al-ǧāmiʻ al-rabbānī al-haykal al-lāmiʻ al-nūrānī sayydinā al-Šayḫ Muḥīy al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī (al-Qāhira: Dar al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā - Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1331).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Yūsuf al-Sanūsī and Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. Ibrāhīm Tilimsānī 2009

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Yūsuf al-Sanūsī and Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. Ibrāhīm Tilimsānī 2009. Umm al-barāhīn li-al-Imām [...] al-Sanūsī wa-yalīhā Šarḥ Umm al-barāhīn li-tilmīḏ al-Sanūsī, ed. Ḫālid Zahrī (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2009).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. Yūsuf al-Ḫayyāṭ and Yaḥyā b. Muḥammad al-Ḥaṭṭāb 1348

reference.div: Muḥammad b. Yūsuf al-Ḫayyāṭ and Yaḥyā b. Muḥammad al-Ḥaṭṭāb 1348. La’āli’ al-ṭall al-nadiyya šarḥ al-Bākūra al-ǧaniyya fī ʻamal [al-’āla] al-ǧaybiyya... wa-bi-asfal ṣaḥā’ifihi taqrīrāt li-al-mu’allif wa-li-al-ʻallāma ... Muḥammad Ḥāmid min ʻulamā’ al-Ḥiǧāz ... wa-yalīhi Wasīlat al-ṭullāb fī ʻilm al-falak bi-ṭarīq al-ḥisāb (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1348).
Muḥammad b. al-Muḫtār al-Tiǧānī 2008. Dīwān tiryāq al-fuhūm fī šamm rā’iḥat manāqib al-Quṭb al-Maktūm (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Qāhira, 2008).
Muḥammad b. al-Muḫtār al-Šinǧīṭī al-Tiǧānī 2010. ʻUnwān Maṭāliʻ al-Ǧamāl fī Mawlid Insān al-Kamāl, ed. Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Tiǧānī ([al-Qāhira]: Dār al-Ḥisām, 2010).
Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Ǧazā’irī 1982. al-Qaḏḏāfī wa-al-mutaqawwilūn ʻalayhi (Bayrūt: Dār ʻUqba ibn Nāfiʻ, 1982).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Muʻṭī b. Abī al-Fatḥ al-Isḥāqī al-Manūfī and ʻAbd Allāh al-Šarqāwī 1311

reference.div: Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Muʻṭī b. Abī al-Fatḥ al-Isḥāqī al-Manūfī and ʻAbd Allāh al-Šarqāwī 1311. Aḫbār al-uwal fī man taṣarrafa fī Miṣr min arbāb al-duwal [...] wa-bi-hāmišihi Tuḥfat al-nāẓirīn fī man waliya Miṣr min al-salāṭīn (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Azhariyya al-Miṣriyya, 1311).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Saḫāwī and ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī 2005

reference.div: Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Saḫāwī and ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī 2005. Fatḥ al-muġīṯ bi-šarḥ Alfiyyat al-ḥadīṯ, eds ʻAbd al-Karīm b. ʻAbd Allāh Ḫuḍayr and Muḥammad b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Fuhayd Āl Fuhayd, Silsilat manšūrāt Maktabat Dār al-Minhāǧ li-al-Našr wa-al-Tawzīʻ bi-al-Riyāḍ, 1 (al-Riyāḍ: Maktabat Dār al-Minhāǧ, 2005).
Muḥammad b. ʻAlawī al-Mālikī al-Ḥasanī 1417. al-Ziyāra al-nabawiyya bayna al-šarʻiyya wa-al-bidʻiyya, Silsilat īḍāḥ mafāhīm al-sunna al-nabawiyya, 3 (1417).

entry.citation: Muḥammad b. ʻAlawī b. ʻAbbās al-Mālikī 1418

reference.div: Muḥammad b. ʻAlawī b. ʻAbbās al-Mālikī 1418. Ḥawla al-iḥtifāl bi-ḏikrā al-mawlid al-nabawī al-šarīf, Silsilat īḍāḥ mafāhīm al-sunna al-nabawiyya, 5 (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻa Dār Ǧawāmiʻ al-Kalam, al-Dirāsa, 1418).

Petrus Aethiops 1549. Modus baptizandi, preces et benedictiones quibus Ecclesia Ethiopum utitur, cum sacerdotes benedicunt puerperae unà cum infante Ecclesiam ingredienti, post quadragesimum puerperij diem. Item orationes quibus ijdem utuntur in sacramento baptismi et confirmationis. Item missa qua communiter utuntur, quae etiam canon uniuersalis appellatur nunc primum ex lingua Chaldea siue Aethiopica in Latinam conuersae (Romae: apud Antonium Bladum, 1549).

Petrus Ethyops 1548. Testamentum Novum: Cum Epistola Pauli Ad Hebreos tantum, cum concordantijs Evangelistarum Eusebii & numeratione omnium verborum eorundem. The second, a description of all the circum-nauigations of the globes. The third, nauigations and voyages of English-men, alongst the coasts of Africa, to the Cape of Good Hope, and from thence to the Red Sea, the Abassine, Arabian, Persian, Indian, shoares, continents, and ilands. The fourth, English voyages beyondthe East Indies, to the ilands of Iapan, China, Cauchinchina, the Philippinae with others, and the Indian nauigations further prosecuted: theiriust commerce, nobly vindicated against Turkish treacherie; victoriously defended against Portugall hostilitie; gloriously aduanced against Moorish and ethnike perfidie; hopefully recouering from Dutch malignitie; iustly maintayned against ignorant and malicious calumnie. The fifth, nauigations, voyages, traffiques, discoueries, of the English nation in theeasterne parts of the world: continuing the English-Indian occurrents ., I, Hakluytus posthumus, or Purchas his pilgrimes : contayning a history of the world in sea voyages and lande travells by Englishmen and others (London: Printed by William Stansby for Henrie Fetherstone, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-hard at the signe of the Rose, 1625).

Adjunctæ sunt rubricæ rituales ex variis codicibus mss. collectæ, & suis locis appositæ. Earumdem liturgiarum contextus Græcus, ex codice Græco-Arabico Bibliothecæ Regiæ: priorum duarum nunquam editus: tertiæ pridem editus sub titulo Liturgiæ sancti Marci, cum versione Latina & notis necessariis. [Tasfā Gabra Śǝllāse], ed., 1966. ሰባቱ፡ ኪዳናት፡ ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም። መልክአ፡ ጉባኤ፡ (Sabātu kidānāt, qǝddāse Māryām, malkǝʾa gubāʾe ba-lǝssāna gǝʿǝz, ‘The Seven Kidanat, the ‘Anaphora of Mary’, and the Collection of Images) (Addis Ababa: Tasfā Gabra Śǝllāse māttamiyā bet, 1966).
[Tasfā Gabra Śǝllāse], ed., 1969. መጽሐፈ፡ ቅዳሴ። በግዕዝና፡ በአማርኛ። (Maṣḥafa qǝddāse. Bagǝʿǝzǝnnā baʾamārǝññā, ‘Book of the Missal. In Gǝʿǝz and Amharic’) (ʾAddis ʾAbabā: Tasfā māttamiyā bet, 1969).

entry.citation: al-Bakrī, Abū Bakr b. Uṯmān al-Dimyāṭī and Zayn al-Dīn b. Ġazzāl al-Malībārī s.a.

reference.div: al-Bakrī, Abū Bakr b. Uṯmān al-Dimyāṭī and Zayn al-Dīn b. Ġazzāl al-Malībārī s.a. Iʻānat al-ṭālibīn ʻalā ḥall alfāẓ Fatḥ al-muʻīn ... wuḍiʻa bi-al-hāmiš Fatḥ al-muʻīn al-maḏkūr maʻa taqrīrāt šarīfa wa-ziyādāt al-munīfa li-al-mu’allif al-Sayyid al-Bakrī (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Bakrī, Abū Bakr ʻUṯmān b. Muḥammad Šaṭṭā’ al-Dimyāṭī and Zayn al-Dīn b. ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Malībārī al-Funānī 1356

Aḥmad Saʻd ʻAlī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1356).

Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥālabī wa aḫawayihi Bakrī wa ʻĪsā (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, ).

entry.citation: al-Bannānī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Ǧād Allāh S. A.

entry.citation: al-Baqarī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar and Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad s.a.

Muḥammad b. ʻUmar al-Baqarī al-Šāfiʻī ʻalā Šarḥ matn al-Raḥbiyya fī ʻilm al-farā’iḍ li-al-imām al-šahīr bi-Sibṭ al-Māridīnī ... wa-bi-hāmišihi al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Dār iḥyā’ al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya li-aṣḥābihā ʻĪsā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Šurakā’ihi, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Baqarī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar and al-Sibṭ al-Māridīnī n.d.

reference.div: al-Baqarī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar and al-Sibṭ al-Māridīnī n.d. Ḥāšiyat al-ʻālim al-ʻallāma [...] Muḥammad b. ʻUmar al-Baqarī ʻalā Šarḥ al-raḥbiyya li’l-imām Sibṭ al-Māridīnī - wa bi-hāmišihā al-Šarḥ al-maḏkūr li’l-imām al-Sibṭ al-Māridīnī ([al-Qāhira]: Maḥmūd Tawfīq al-Kutubī, ).

al-Barzanǧī, al-Ǧurǧāwī, al-Šayḫ ʻIīš, and al-Nawwawī al-Ǧāwī n.d. al-Mawlid al-nabawī [...] al-musammā Mawlid al-Barzanǧī - wa ʻalayhi al-šarḥ al-musammā Talḥīm al-ṣanǧī šarḥ mawlid al-šāyḫ al-Barzanǧī (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maḥmūsiyya al-Tiǧāriyya bi-al-Azhar, ).

entry.citation: al-Barzanǧī, Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan et al. 1429

al-Barzanǧī, Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan n.d. Mawlid šaraf al-ānām (Lucknow (?): ).

entry.citation: al-Bayḍāwī, Nāṣir al-Dīn Abū Saʻīd ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻumar b. Muḥammad al-Šīrāzī and al-Kāzarūnī, Abū al-Faḍl al-Qurašī al-Ṣiddīqī al-Ḫaṭīb 1330

reference.div: al-Bayḍāwī, Nāṣir al-Dīn Abū Saʻīd ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻumar b. Muḥammad al-Šīrāzī and al-Kāzarūnī, Abū al-Faḍl al-Qurašī al-Ṣiddīqī al-Ḫaṭīb 1330. entry.citation: al-Baǧīramī, Sulaymān b. Muḥammad et al. 1345

Ḥāšiyat [...] al-Šayḫ Sulaymān al-Baǧīramī ʻalā šarḥ Manhaǧ al-ṭullāb [...] wa-bi-hāmišihi maʻa al-šarḥ nafā’is wa-laṭā’if muntaḫaba min taqrīr [...] Muḥammad al-Marṣafī ʻalā hāḏa al-kitāb (Miṣr: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1345).

entry.citation: al-Baǧīramī, Sulaymān b. Muḥammad et al. 1355

Ḥāšiyat al-Baǧīramī ʻalā Manhaǧ al-ṭullāb li-qāḍī al-quḍāt al-Šayḫ Abī Yaḥyā Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī ... wa-bi-hāmišihi maʻa al-šarḥ nafā’is wa-laṭā’if muntaḫaba min Taqrīr al-ʻallāma al-šayḫ al-kabīr Aḥmad al-Marṣafī ʻalā hāḏa al-kitāb (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-Tiǧāriyya al-Kubrā, 1355).

entry.citation: al-Baǧīramī, Sulaymān b. Muḥammad et al. s.a.

reference.div: al-Baǧīramī, Sulaymān b. Muḥammad, Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, and al-Marṣafī, Muḥammad b. Aḥmad s.a. Ḥāšiyat [...] al-Šayḫ Sulaymān al-Baǧīramī (2) ʻalā šarḥ Manhaǧ al-ṭullāb [...] wa-bi-hāmišihi maʻa al-šarḥ nafā’is wa-laṭā’if muntaḫaba min taqrīr [...] Muḥammad al-Marṣafī ʻalā hāḏa al-kitāb (s.l.: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Biqāʻī, ʻUmar b. Muḥammad Barakāt et al. 1358

al-Buḫārī 1981. Ṣaḥīḥ al-Buḫārī (2) (Dār al-fikr li-al-ṭibāʻa wa-al-našr wa-al-tawzīʻ, 1981).
al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl 1986. Kitāb Ta’rīḫ al-Kabīr li-al-Buḫārī (al-Qāhira: al-Fārūq al-Ḥadīṯa li-al-Ṭibāʻa wa-al-Našr, 1986).

entry.citation: al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Ibrāhīm b. al-Muġīra b. Bardizbah Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Ǧuʻfī 1981

reference.div: al-Buḫārī, Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Ibrāhīm b. al-Muġīra b. Bardizbah Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Ǧuʻfī 1981. Matn al-Buḫārī maškūl bi-ḥāšiyyat al-Sindī (Cairo: Dār Iḥyā’ al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya, 1981).

entry.citation: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrahīm and al-ʻAmrīṭī, Šaraf al-Dīn 1325

reference.div: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrahīm and al-ʻAmrīṭī, Šaraf al-Dīn 1325. Fatḥ Rabb al-barriyya ʻalā al-Durra al-Bahiyya naẓm al-Āǧurrūmiyya - wa bi’l-hāmiš Naẓm al-Āǧurrūmiyya (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā - Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1325).

al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrahīm, Ibn Qāsim Muḥammad al-Ġazzī, and Abū Šuǧāʻ al-Iṣfahānī 1331. Ḥāšiyat al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā šarḥ Ibn Qāsim al-Ġāzzī ʻalā al-Ġāya li-Abī Šuǧāʻ (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya - Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1331).

entry.citation: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm and Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī 1354

reference.div: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm and Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī 1354. Ḥāšiyat al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā Ibn Qāsim - Šarḥ ... ʻalā matn al-Šayḫ Abī al-Šuǧāʻ fī maḏhab al-iimām al-Šāfiʻī - wa bi’l-hāmiš al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr (al-Qāhira: al-Maktaba al-Tiǧāriyya al-Kubrā - Muṣṭafā Muḥammad, 1354).
al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad 1306. Ḥāšiya ʻalā Šarḥ al-Šinšawrī ʻalā Matn al-raḥbiyya fī ʻilm al-farā’iḍ (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻah al-Azhariyya, 1306).
al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad 2002. Tuḥfat al-murīd, ed. Laǧnat taḥqīq al-turāṯ (Cairo: al-Maktab al-Azhariyya li-al-Turāṯ, 2002).

entry.citation: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad and al-Aḫḍarī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad 1306

reference.div: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad and al-Aḫḍarī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad 1306. Ḥāšiya al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā matn al-Sullam al-marawniq fī fann al-manṭiq (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya, 1306).

entry.citation: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad and al-Tirmiḏī, Muḥammad b. ʻĪsā 1355

reference.div: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad and al-Tirmiḏī, Muḥammad b. ʻĪsā 1355. al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya (2) ʻalā al-Šamā’il al-muḥammadiyya ... qad ǧaʻalnā matn al-Šamā’il bi-aʻlā al-ṣafḥā wa-al-ḥāšiya bi-asfalihā (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-Tiǧāriyya al-Kubrā / Maṭbaʻa al-istiqāma, 1355).

entry.citation: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad and al-Tirmiḏī, Muḥammad b. ‘Īsā 1319

reference.div: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad and al-Tirmiḏī, Muḥammad b. ‘Īsā 1319. al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya ʻalā al-Šamā’il al-muḥammadiyya ... wa-bi-hāmišihā matn al-Šamā’il al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ʻĀmira al-Šarafiyya, 1319).

entry.citation: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad et al. 2011

reference.div: al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad, al-Aḫḍarī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad, and al-Inbābī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 2011. Ḥāšiyat Šayḫ al-Islām al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā matn al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq li-l-Imām al-Aḫḍarī: wa-bi-hāmišihā Ḥāšiyat al-Šayḫ Muḥammad al-Inbābī (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Salām li-l-Ṭibāʻa wa-l-našir wa-l-tawzīʻ wa-l-tarǧama, 2011).

al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm, al-Aḫḍarī, and Muḥamamd al-Inbābī 1347. Ḥāšiyat ḫātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn ... al-šayḫ Ibrāhīm al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā matn al-Sullam fī fann al-manṭiq li’l-imām al-Aḫḍarī - wa bi-hāmišihā matn al-Sullam al-maḏkūr maʻa taqrīr al-muḥaqqiq ... al-šāyḫ Muḥammad al-Inbābī (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Babī al-Ḥalabī wa awlādihi bi-Miṣr, 1347).

al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm, Ibn Qāsim Muḥammad al-Ġazzī, and Abū Šuǧāʻ al-Iṣfahānī 1925. Ḥāšiyyat al-ʻAllāma al-Fāḍil wa-al-Qudwa (3) al-Kāmil al-Šayḫ Ibrāhīm al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā Šarḥ al-ʻAllāma Ibn Qāsim al-Ġazzī ʻalā Matn al-Šāyḫ Abī Šuǧāʻ fī Maḏhab al-Imām al-Šāfiʻī (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻā al-Maymaniyya, 1925).

al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm, Būṣīrī, Muḥammad b. Saʻīd, and Ḫālid al-Azharī n.d. Ḥāšiyat [...] al-Bāǧūrī ʻalā matn al-Burda [...] wa-bi-hāmišihā šarḥ al-šayḫ Ḫālid al-Azharī ʻalā al-Burda (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-maymaniyya, ).

entry.citation: al-Būnī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1390

reference.div: al-Būnī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1390. Šams al-maʻārif wa-laṭā’if al-ʻawārif (Beirut: al-Maktaba al-Šaʻbiyya, 1390).

entry.citation: al-Būnī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1985

reference.div: al-Būnī, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1985. Šams al-maʻārif al-kubrā wa-laṭā’if al-ʻawārif (Bayrūt: al-Maktaba al-Šaʻbiyya, 1985).

entry.citation: al-Būṣīrī, ʻABd Allāh Muḥammad b. Saʻīd and Kaʻb b. Zuhayr 1337

reference.div: al-Būṣīrī, ʻABd Allāh Muḥammad b. Saʻīd and Kaʻb b. Zuhayr 1337. Maǧmūʻ ṯalāṯ qaṣā’id (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa Awlādihi bi-Miṣr, 1337).
al-Damanhūrī, Muḥammad 1956. al-Muḫtaṣar al-šāfī ʻalā matn al-Kāfī (Cairo: Maktabat Muḥammad ʻAlī Ṣubayḥ wa-awlādihi bi-maydān al-Azhar, 1956).

entry.citation: al-Damanhūrī, Muḥammad and al-Ḫawwāṣ, Aḥmad b. ʻAbbād b. Šuʻayb al-Qinā’ī 1957

reference.div: al-Damanhūrī, Muḥammad and al-Ḫawwāṣ, Aḥmad b. ʻAbbād b. Šuʻayb al-Qinā’ī 1957. al-Iršād al-šāfī wa-huwa al-ḥāšiya al-kubrā ʻalā matn al-Kāfī fī ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-kawāfī (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1957).

entry.citation: al-Damanhūrī, Muḥammad and al-Ḫawāṣṣ, Aḥmad b. ʻAbbās al-Qinā’ī 1354

reference.div: al-Damanhūrī, Muḥammad and al-Ḫawāṣṣ, Aḥmad b. ʻAbbās al-Qinā’ī 1354. al-Muḫtaṣar al-šāfī ʻalā matn al-Kāfī ... wa-bi-hāmišihi al-Kāfī fi ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qawāfī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1354).

al-Damhanūrī, Aḥmad and al-Aḫḍarī 1324. Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam fī al-manṭiq - wa yalīhi šarḥ al-ʻallāmā al-Aḫḍarī ʻalā Sullamihi al-maḏkūr (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya - Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa aḫawayhi Bakrī wa ʻĪsā, 1324).

entry.citation: al-Damāmīnī, Badr al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr al-Maḫzūmī and al-Anṣārī, Zakariyā’ 1324

reference.div: al-Damāmīnī, Badr al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr al-Maḫzūmī and al-Anṣārī, Zakariyā’ 1324. al-ʻUyūn al-fāḫira al-ġāmiza ʻalā ḫabāyā al-rāmiza - Wa bi-al-hāmiš kitāb fatḥ al-Rabb al-Barriyya bi-šarḥ al-Ḫazraǧiyya, ed. Muḥammad al-Zuhrī al-Ġamrāwī (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya, 1324).

entry.citation: al-Damīrī, Muḥammad b. Mūsā b. ʻῙsā Kamāl al-Dīn and al-Qazwīnī, Zakariyyā’ b. Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd 1376

reference.div: al-Damīrī, Muḥammad b. Mūsā b. ʻῙsā Kamāl al-Dīn and al-Qazwīnī, Zakariyyā’ b. Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd 1376. Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān al-kubrā ... wa-yalīhi ʻAǧā’ib al-maḫlūqāt wa-ġarā’ib al-mawǧūdāt (Cairo: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1376).

entry.citation: al-Dardīr, Aḥmad and al-Ġayṭī, Naǧm al-Dīn 1328

reference.div: al-Dardīr, Aḥmad and al-Ġayṭī, Naǧm al-Dīn 1328. Ḥāšiyat alimām al-ʻārif bi’Llāh taʻālā Abī al-Barakāt sayyidī Aḥmad al-Dardīr ʻalā Qiṣṣat al-miʻrāǧ li’l-ʻallāma al-himām barakat al-anām Naǧm al-Dīn al-Ġayṭī (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya - Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1328).

entry.citation: al-Dasūqī, Muḥammad and al-Sanūsī, Muḥammad b. Yūsuf 1358

reference.div: al-Dasūqī, Muḥammad and al-Sanūsī, Muḥammad b. Yūsuf 1358. Ḥāšiya ʻalā Šarḥ Umm al-barāhīn ... wa-bi-hāmišihi Šarḥ Umm al-barāhīn (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1358).

entry.citation: al-Dasūqī, Muḥammad b. Aḥmad and al-Sanūsī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Yūsuf 1329

reference.div: al-Dasūqī, Muḥammad b. Aḥmad and al-Sanūsī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Yūsuf 1329. Ḥāšiyat al-ʻallāma ... Muḥammad al-Dasūqī ʻalā Šarḥ umm al-barāhīn ... wa-bi-hāmišihi al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ḫayriyya, 1329).

entry.citation: al-Dayrabī, Aḥmad and al-Sanūsī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Yūsuf 1338

reference.div: al-Dayrabī, Aḥmad and al-Sanūsī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Yūsuf 1338. Kitāb Muǧarrabāt al-ʻālim al-ʻallāma al-Šayḫ Aḥmad al-Dayrabī al-musammā bi-Fatḥ al-malik al-maǧīd al-mu’allaf li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd ... wa-bi-hāmišihi kitāb Muǧarrabāt al-imām al-Sānūsī (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻat al-Raḥmāniyya, 1338).
al-Dayrabī, Aḥmad b. ʻUmar 1956. Ġāyat al-maqṣūd li-man yataʻāṭā al-ʻuqūd (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1956).
al-Daǧwī, Yūsuf Aḥmad Naṣr 1914. Kitāb sabīl al-saʻāda (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻat al-Nahḍa al-Adabiyya, 1914).
al-Dimyāṭī, Nūr al-Dīn 1258. Farā’id al-La’ālī fī bayān asmā’ al-mutaʻālī, ed. Ibrāhīm b. Meḥmed Ṣāliḥ al-Qādirī al-Kasṭamūnī al-Istānbūlī (Istanbul: Matbaa-yı Amire, 1258).
al-Dāh al-Šinqīṭī, Muḥammad b. Aḥmad 1394. Fatḥ al-wahhāb šarḥ ʻalā Bulūġ al-marām min adillat al-aḥkām (Bayrūt: Dār al-Fikr, 1394).

reference.div: al-Dīrīnī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz b. Aḥmad n.d. Ṭahārat al-qulūb (2) wal-ḫuḍūʻ li-ʻallām al-ġuyūb (Cairo: Maktaba wa-maṭbaʻat Muḥammad ʻAlī Ṣubayḥ wa-awlādihi, ).

reference.div: al-Fašnī, Šihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad b. al-Ḥiǧāzī 1357. Tuḥfat al-iḫwān fī qirā’at al-mīʻād fī Raǧab wa Šaʻbān wa RTuḥfat al-iḫwān fī qirā’at al-mīʻād fī Raǧab wa Šaʻbān wa Ramaḍān (al-Qāhira: Muḥammad ʻAbd al-ʻĀdil al-ʻAbbādī - Maṭbaʻat al-Šarq, 1357).

reference.div: al-Fākihī, ʻAbd Allāh b. Aḥmad and al-Ḥaṭṭāb, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 1322. Šarḥ al-Fawākih al-ǧaniyya ʻalā Mutammimat al-Āǧurrūmiyya ... wa-bi-hāmišihi matn ḏālika al-šarḥ wa-huwa Mutammimat al-Aǧurrūmiyya fī ʻilm al-ʻarabiyya (Miṣr: Matbaʻat al-Taqaddum al-ʻIlmiyya, 1322).

al-Isfarā’inī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad 1883. Der Tod des Ḥusein ben ʻAlī und die Rache (Göttingen: Dieterichsche Verlags Buchhandlung, 1883).

entry.citation: al-Lamṭī, Aḥmad b. Mubārak and al-Šaʻrānī, ʻAbd al-Wahhāb 1345

reference.div: al-Lamṭī, Aḥmad b. Mubārak and al-Šaʻrānī, ʻAbd al-Wahhāb 1345. al-Ibrīz allaḏī talaqqāhu naǧm al-ʻirfān al-ḥāfiẓ Sayyidī Aḥmad b. al-Mubārak ʻan Quṭb al-wāṣilīn Sayyidī ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Dabbāġ ... wa-bi-hāmišihi kitābān ǧalīlān awwaluhumā kitāb Durar al-ġawwāṣ ʻalā fatāwī Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Ḫawwāṣ wa-ṯānīhimā kitāb al-Ǧawāhir wa-al-durar ... wa-kilāhumā li-al-quṭb ... Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Šaʻrānī (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Azhariyya, 1345).

entry.citation: al-Laqānī, Ibrāhīm b. Ibrāhīm and al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad 1907

reference.div: al-Laqānī, Ibrāhīm b. Ibrāhīm and al-Bāǧūrī, Ibrāhīm b. Muḥammad 1907. La Djaouhara, traité de théologie, par Ibrahim Laqani, avec notes d’Abdesselem et d’El Badjouri. Texte arabe et traduction française, par J.-D. Luciani., ed. J.-D. Luciani (Alger: impr. de P. Fontana, 1907).
al-Laqānī, Ibrāhīm b. Ibrāhīm n.d. Kašf al-kurūb bi-munāǧāt al-ḥabīb wa-al-tawassul bi-al-maḥbūb, ed. Muṣṭafā Muḥammad ʻUmāra (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, ).

entry.citation: al-Madanī, Muḥammad and al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1333

reference.div: al-Madanī, Muḥammad and al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1333. al-Itḥāfāt al-saniyya fī al-aḥādīṯ al-qudsiyya; Masālik al-ḥunafā’ fī wāliday al-Muṣṭafā; al-Maqāma al-sundusiyya fī al-nisba al-muṣtawfiyya; Inbā’ al-aḏkiyā’ fī ḥayāt al-anbiyā’ (Ḥaydarābād al-Dakkan: Dā’irat al-Maʻārif al-Niẓāmiyya, 1333).
al-Malibārī, Zayn al-Dīn b. ʿAlī 1991. Sirāǧ al-qulūb wa-ʻilāǧ al-ḏunūb, eds Muʿawwad, ʿAlī Muḥammad and ʿAbd al-Mawǧūd, ʿAdil Aḥmad (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Zahrā’, 1991).

entry.citation: al-Maqqarī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Aḥmad b. Yaḥyā 1374

reference.div: al-Maqqarī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Aḥmad b. Yaḥyā 1374. Iḍā’at al-duǧunna fī iʻtiqād Ahl al-Sunna (al-Qāhira: Maktaba al-Qāhira, 1374).

al-Maqqarī, Aḥmad, al-Dāh al-Šinqīṭī, Muḥammad b. Aḥmad, and Ibn Fāris, Aḥmad b. Fāris b. Zakariyyā’ 1371. Iḍā’at al-duǧunna fī iʻtiqād Ahl al-Sunna ... wa-li-tamām al-nafʻ waḍaʻnā ʻalayhi Šarḥ al-šayḥ Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-mulaqqab bi-al-Dāh al-Šinqīṭī wa-yalīhi Awǧaz al-sayr li-ḫayr al-bašar li-Ibn Fāris, ed. Abū al-Faḍl ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad al-Ṣiddīq al-Ġamārī (Bayrūt: Dār al-ʻIlm al-Ǧamīʻ, 1371).

entry.citation: al-Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf and Ibn Sīnā 1900

reference.div: al-Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf and Ibn Sīnā 1900. Kitāb al-ʻallāma Zayn al-Dīn [...] ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf [...] al-Munāwī ʻalā Qaṣīdat al-nafs li-Ibn Sīnā ([al-Qāhira]: Maṭbaʻat al-Mawsūʻāt, 1900).

entry.citation: al-Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf and al-Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad 1318

reference.div: al-Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf and al-Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad 1318. Ǧamʻ al-wasā’il fī šarḥ al-Šamā’il ... wa-bi-hāmišihi baqiyyat šarḥ al-imām al-muḥaddiṯ al-šayḫ ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf al-Munāwī al-Miṣrī (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ʻĀmira al-Šarafiyya, 1318).
al-Murtaḍā al-Zabīdī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 1306. Tāǧ al-ʻarūs min ǧawāhir al-qāmūs, vol. 1-10 (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Ḫayriyya, 1306).
al-Murtaḍā al-Zabīdī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 1994. Tāǧ al-ʻarūs min ǧawāhir al-qāmūs, vol. 1-20, ed. ʻAlī Šayrī (Bayrūt: Dār al-Fikr, 1994).

entry.citation: al-Murtaḍā al-Zabīdī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. ‘Abd al-Razzāq 1994

reference.div: al-Murtaḍā al-Zabīdī, Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. Muḥammad b. ‘Abd al-Razzāq 1994. Itḥāf al-sāda al-muttaqīn bi-šarḥ Iḥyā’ ʻulūm al-dīn (Bayrūt: Mu’assasat al-ta’rīḫ al-ʻarabī, 1994).

entry.citation: al-Māwardī, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. Muḥammad Ibn Ḥabīb al-Baṣrī 1987

reference.div: al-Māwardī, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. Muḥammad Ibn Ḥabīb al-Baṣrī 1987. Adab al-dīn wa al-duniya (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 1987).

entry.citation: al-Mīrġanī, Muḥammad ʻUṯmān b. Muḥammad Abī Bakr b. ʻAbd and Muḥammad b. ʻUṯmān al-Mīrġanī 1332

reference.div: al-Mīrġanī, Muḥammad ʻUṯmān b. Muḥammad Abī Bakr b. ʻAbd and Muḥammad b. ʻUṯmān al-Mīrġanī 1332. al-Nūr al-barrāq fī madḥ al-Nabī al-miṣdāq wa yalīhi al-Nafaḥāt a-madaniyya fī al-madā’iḥ al-muṣṭafawiyya ([al-Qāhira]: al-Sayyid Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Salām al-Maġribī, 1332).

entry.citation: al-Mīrġānī, ʻAbd Allāh b. Ibrāhīm ʻAfīf al-Dīn S. A.

reference.div: al-Mīrġānī, ʻAbd Allāh b. Ibrāhīm ʻAfīf al-Dīn S. A. al-Rasā’il al-mīrġaniyya (S. L: S. A.).
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf 1330. Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn arbaʻīn fī aḥādīṯ sayyid al-mursalīn (Bayrūt: 1330).
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismaʻīl n.d. -Saʻādat al-dārayn fī al-ṣalāt ʻalā sayyd al-kawnayn.
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl 1310. al-Anwār al-muḥammadiyya (3) min al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya (Bayrūt: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Adabiyya, 1310).
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl 1379. Ǧawāhir (2) al-biḥār fī faḍā’il al-nabī al-muḫtār (Miṣr: Šarikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1379).
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl 1916. Ǧawāhir (3) al-biḥār fī faḍā’il al-nabī al-muḫtār (Bayrūt: 1916).
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl 1997. Saʻādat al-dārayn fī al-ṣalāt ʻalā sayyid al-kawnayn, ed. ʻAbd al-Wāriṯ Muḥammad ʻAlī (Bayrūt: Dār al-kutub al-ʻilmiyya, 1997).

entry.citation: al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl and ʻAbd Allāh b. Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī 1329

reference.div: al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl and ʻAbd Allāh b. Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī 1329. Ǧāmiʻ karāmāt al-awliyā’ ... wa-yalīhi kitāb Asbāb al-ta’līf ... wa-tatmīman li-al-fawā’id waḍaʻnā bi-al-hāmiš baqiyyat al-kitāb al-ǧalīl al-musammā Našr al-maḥāsin al-ġāliya fī faḍl mašā’iḫ al-ṣūfiyya (Miṣr: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, 1329).

al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl n.d. Maǧmūʻ yaštamil ʻalā ṯalāṯa kutub: (1) al-Qaṣīda al-rā’iyya al-kubrā fī al-kamālāt al-ilāhiyya wa-al-sīra al-nabawiyya wa-waḍʻ al-milla al-islāmiyya wa-al-milal al-uḫrā, (2) Saʻādat al-anām fī atbāʻ dīn al-islām, (3) Muḫtaṣar Iršād al-ḥayārā fī taḥḏīr al-muslimīn min madāris al-naṣārā.
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl n.d. Dīwān al-madā’iḥ al-nabawiyya al-musammā al-ʻUqūd al-lu’lu’iyya fī al-madā’iḥ al-muḥammadiyya.
al-Nabahānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl s.a. al-Anwār al-muḥammadiyya min al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya (s.l.: Not given, s.a.).
al-Nabhānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl 1320. al-Anwār al-muḥammadiyya (4) min al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya, 1320).
al-Nabhānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl 1996. Ǧāmiʻ karāmāt al-awliyā’, ed. ʻAbd al-Wāriṯ Muḥammad ʻAlī (Bayrūt: Dār al-kutub al-ʻilmiyya, 1996).

entry.citation: al-Nabhānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl S. A.

reference.div: al-Nabhānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl S. A. Kitāb Ǧawāhir al-biḥār fī faḍā’il al-nabī al-muḫtār (Cairo / Mecca: Dār miṣriyya li-al-ṭabaʻa / Maktaba al-Ḥaramayn, S. A.).
al-Nabhānī, Yūsuf b. Ismāʻīl s.a. al-Anwār al-muḥammadiyya (2) min al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya (Miṣr: Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, s.a.).
al-Nawawī 1966. al-Maǧmūʻ šarḥ al-Muhaḏḏab (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat al-ʻĀṣima, 1966).
al-Nawawī S. A. Riyāḍ al-ṣāliḥīn (Cairo: Maktabat Muḥammad ʻAlī Ṣubayḥ wa-awlādihi bi-maydān al-Azhar, S. A.).

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā b. Šaraf and Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā b. Muḥammad 1314. Minhāǧ al-ṭālibīn (2) wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn ... wa-bi-hāmišihi matn al-Manhaǧ ([Miṣr]: al-Maṭbaʻa al-ʻĀmira al-Šarafiyya, 1314).

entry.citation: al-Nawawī, Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā b. Šaraf and Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā b. Muḥammad s.a.

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar and al-Barzanǧī, Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan 1340. Madāriǧ al-ṣuʻūd (2) ilā iktisā’ al-burūd ... šarḥ ʻalā al-Mawlid al-nabawī ... wa-bi-hāmišihi al-Mawlid al-maḏkūr (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1340).
al-Nawawī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakariyyā’ 2001. The garden of the Gnostics (Bustān al-ʻĀrifīn) (Leicester: Al-Farooq International, 2001).

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā b. Šaraf 1968. Bustān al-ʻārifīn, ed. Muḥammad ʻAlī Ṣabīḥ (Cairo: 1968).

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakariyyā’ and ʻAbd al-Karīm b. Muḥammad Rāfiʻī 1985. Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftiyyīn (Dimašq: al-Maktab al-Islāmī, 1985).

Muḥammad al-Rāfiʻī, and Ibn Ḥaǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Abū al-Faḍl Aḥmad b. ʻAlī 1344. al-Maǧmūʻ šarḥ al-Muhaḏḏab ... wa-yalīhi Fatḥ al-ʻazīz šarḥ al-Waǧīz ... wa-yalīhi al-Talḫīṣ al-ḥabīr fī taḫrīǧ aḥādīṯ al-Rāfiʻī al-kabīr (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-Taḍāmun al-Aḫawī, 1344).

Muḥammad al-Rāfiʻī, and Ibn Ḥaǧar al-ʻAsqalānī, Abū al-Faḍl Aḥmad b. ʻAlī n.d. al-Maǧmūʻ šarḥ al-Muhaḏḏab ... wa-yalīhi Fatḥ al-ʻazīz šarḥ al-Waǧīz ... wa-yalīhi al-Talḫīṣ al-ḥabīr fī taḫrīǧ aḥādīṯ al-Rāfiʻī al-kabīr (2) (Beirut: Dār al-fikr, ).

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Yaḥyā b. Šaraf Muḥyī al-Dīn 1417. Taṣḥīḥ al-Tanbīh, ed. Muḥammad ʻUqla al-Ibrāhīm (Bayrūt: Mu’assasa al-Risāla, 1417).

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī 1936. Nūr al-ẓulām šarḥ Manẓumat ʻAqīdat al-ʻawāmm, eds Aḥmad Saʻd ʻAlī, Muḥammad Amīn ʻImrān, and Rustom Muṣṭafā al-Ḥalabī (al-Qāhira: [Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī], 1936).

entry.citation: al-Nawawī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and Aḥmad b. Zayn al-Ḥabašī n.d.

reference.div: al-Nawawī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and Aḥmad b. Zayn al-Ḥabašī n.d. Bahǧat al-wasā’il bi-šarḥ al-masā’il ʻalā al-Rišālā al-ǧāmiʻa bayna uṣūl al-dīn wa al-fish wa al-taṣawwuf (al-Qāhira: ).

al-Nawāwī 1882. Minhādj at-tālibīn, le guide des zélés croyants. Manuel de jurisprudence musulmane selon le rite de Chafii, ed. Lodewijk Willem Christiaan van den Berg (Batavia: Imprimerie du Gouvernement, 1882).
al-Nawāwī 1914. Minhaj et talibin : a manual of Muhammadan law : according to the school of Shafii, ed. Lodewijk Willem Christiaan van den Berg (London: W. Thacker & Co., 1914).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī 1879

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī 1879. Madāriǧ al-ṣu‘ūd ilā iktisā’ al-burūd (Cairo: 1879).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and al-Wāḥidī, ʻAlī b. Aḥmad s.a.a

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and al-Wāḥidī, ʻAlī b. Aḥmad s.a. al-Tafsīr al-munīr li-maʻālim al-tanzīl ... al-musammā ṭibqan li-maʻnāhu Marāḥ labīd li-kašf maʻnā Qur’ān maǧīd ... wa-bi-hāmišihi kitāb al-Waǧīz fī tafsīt al-Qur’ān al-ʻazīz (Miṣr: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and al-Wāḥidī, ʻAlī b. Aḥmad s.a.b

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and al-Wāḥidī, ʻAlī b. Aḥmad s.a. Marāḥ labīd - Tafsīr al-Nawawī al-Tafsīr al-munīr li-maʻālim al-tanzīl al-musfir ʻan wuǧūh maḥāsin al-ta’wīl al-musammā ṭibqan li-maʻnāhu Marāḥ labīd li-kašf maʻnā Qur’ān maǧīd li-ǧāmiʻihi ... Muḥammad Nawawī al-Ǧāwī ... wa-bi-hāmišihi Kitāb al-waǧīz fī tafsīr al-Qur’ān al-ʻazīz li-al-imām Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. Aḥmad al-Wāḥidī (Sinqāfūra (Singapore): Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Sulaymān Marʻī, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and al-Ġazzālī, Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī 1343

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī and al-Ġazzālī, Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad b. Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī 1343. Šarḥ Marāqī al-ʻubūdiyya [...] ʻalā matn Bidāyat al-hidāya ... wa-bi-hāmišihi Bidāya al-hidāya al-maḏkūra (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1343).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī et al. 1308

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī, Muḥammad Ḥasab Allāh al-Makkī, and Sālim b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Saʻd b. Samīr al-Ḥaḍramī 1308. Kāšifat al-siǧā - bi-hāmišihi (1) Safīnat al-naǧā; (2) al-Riyāḍ al-badī‘a fī uṣūl al-dīn wa-ba‘ḍ furū‘ al-šarī‘a (Cairo: Dār Iḥyā’ al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya, 1308).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī et al. 1332

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī, Muḥammad Ḥasab Allāh al-Makkī, and Sālim b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Saʻd b. Samīr al-Ḥaḍramī 1332. Kāšifat al-siǧā - bi-hāmišihi (1) Matn Safīnat al-naǧā; (2) al-Riyāḍ al-badī‘a fī uṣūl al-dīn wa-ba‘ḍ furū‘ al-šarī‘a ʻalā maḏhab al-imam al-Šāfiʻī (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻa al-Ḫayriyya - al-Sayyid ʻUmar Ḥusayn al-Ḫaššāb, 1332).

entry.citation: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī et al. 1343

reference.div: al-Nawāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻUmar b. ʻArabī al-Ǧāwī, Muḥammad Ḥasab Allāh al-Makkī, and Sālim b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Saʻd b. Samīr al-Ḥaḍramī 1343. Šarḥ Kāšifat al-siǧā ʻalā Safīnat al-naǧā fī uṣūl al-dīn wa al-fiqh; wa-qad ṭurriza hāmiš hāḏā al-kitāb bi-kitābayn (1) matn hāḏā al-šarḥ; (2) kitāb al-Riyāḍ al-badī‘a fī uṣūl al-Dīn wa-ba‘ḍ furū‘ al-šarī‘a ʻalā maḏhab al-Imām al-Šāfiʻī, ed. Ibrāhīm b. Ḥasan al-Inbābī (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭafā al-Babī al-Ḥalabī wa Awlādihi, 1343).

entry.citation: al-Naẓīfī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad Fatḥā b. ʻAbd al-Wāḥid al-Sūsī s.a.

reference.div: al-Naẓīfī, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad Fatḥā b. ʻAbd al-Wāḥid al-Sūsī s.a. Kitāb al-Durra al-ḫarīda šarḥ al-Yaqūta al-farīda - bi-ḏayl ṣaḥā’’ifihi kitāb al-Nafḥa al-rabbāniyya fī al-ṭarīqa al-Tiǧāniyya (Bayrūt - Wād Madanī (Sūdān): al-Maktaba al-Sanʻabaniyya? - Maktaba Maḍawī, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Naẓīfī, Muḥammad Fatḥā b. al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Wāḥid b. Muḥammad al-Tiǧānī 1342

reference.div: al-Naẓīfī, Muḥammad Fatḥā b. al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Wāḥid b. Muḥammad al-Tiǧānī 1342. Qaṣīdat al-Yāqūta al-farīda fī uṣūl wa-ādāb wa-manāqib wa-awrād al-ṭarīqa al-Ḫatmiyya al-Aḥmadiyya al-Tiǧāniyya ([Ḥiǧāz]: al-Šabība al-Tiǧaniyya bi-al-Aqṭār al-Ḥiǧāziyya, 1342).

entry.citation: al-Naẓīfī, Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Wāḥid s.a.

reference.div: al-Naẓīfī, Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Wāḥid s.a. al-Ṭīb al-fā’iḥ wa al-wird al-sā’iḥ fī ṣalāt al-fātiḥ (s.l.: Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat al-Ḥāǧǧ ʻAbd al-Salām b. Muḥammad b. Šaqrūn, s.a.).

al-Nābulusī, ʻAbd al-Ġanī 2013. Diwān al-ḥaqā’iq wa maǧmūʻ al-raqā’iq fī ṣarīḥ al-mawāǧīd alilāhiyya wa al-taǧalliyyāt al-rabbāniyya wa al-futūḥāt al-aqdasiyya, ed. Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Ḫāliq al-Zannātī (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2013).

entry.citation: al-Qalyūbī, Aḥmad b. Aḥmad et al. 1375

reference.div: al-Qalyūbī, Aḥmad b. Aḥmad, ʻAmīra, Aḥmad al-Burullusī, and al-Maḥallī, Muḥammad b. Aḥmad 1375. Ḥāšiyatān: al-ūlā li-Šihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Qalyūbī [...] al-ṯāniya li-Šihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Burullusī al-mulaqqab bi-ʻAmīra [...] ʻalā šarḥ Ǧalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Maḥallī ʻalā Minhāǧ al-Ṭālibīn (Miṣr: Šarikat maktabat wa-maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlādihi, 1375).

entry.citation: al-Qarāfī, Šihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās al-Ṣinhāǧī and Ibn Šāṭṭ, Qāsim b. ʻAbd Allāh al-Anṣārī n. d.

reference.div: al-Qarāfī, Šihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās al-Ṣinhāǧī and Ibn Šāṭṭ, Qāsim b. ʻAbd Allāh al-Anṣārī n. d. al-Furūq li-al-Imām Šihāb al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās al-Ṣinhāǧī al-mašhūr bi-al-Qarāfī ... wa-bi-asfalihā ḥāšiyat ... Ibn al-Šāṭṭ al-musammā Idrār al-šurūq ʻalā anwār al-furūq ... wa-bi-hāmiš al-kitābayn Tahḏīb al-furūq wa-al-qawāʻid al-saniyya fī al-asrār al-fiqhiyya li-mu’allifihi Muḥammad ʻAlī b. Ḥusayn (Beirut: Dār al-maʻrifa, n. d.).
al-Qasṭallānī 1907. al-Mawāhib al-laduniyya bi-al-Minaḥ al-Muḥammadiyya (Cairo: 1907).

entry.citation: al-Qasṭallānī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr b. ‘Abd al-Malik al-Qutaybī al-Miṣrī Abū al-‘Abbās Šihāb al-Dīn et al. n.d.

reference.div: al-Qasṭallānī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr b. ‘Abd al-Malik al-Qutaybī al-Miṣrī Abū al-‘Abbās Šihāb al-Dīn, Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā b. Muḥammad b. Zakariyyā’ Zayn al-Dīn al-Sunaykī al-Šāfiʻī, Muslim b. al-Ḥaǧǧāǧ al-Qušayrī, and al-Nawāwī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakariyyā’ Yaḥyā b. Šaraf b. Murī n.d. Šarḥā Ṣaḥīḥ al-imām al-Bukhārī aḥaduhumā Iršād al-sārī [...] wa-al-ṯānī Tuḥfat al-bārī [...] bi-al-hāmiṣ baqīyat matn Ṣaḥīḥ al-imām Muslim wa-šarḥ al-imām al-Nawawī ʻalayhi (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-maymaniyya, ).

entry.citation: al-Qasṭallānī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad et al. 1304

reference.div: al-Qasṭallānī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad, Muslim b. al-Ḥaǧǧāǧ, and al-Nawawī, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakariyyā’ 1304. Iršād al-sārī li-šarḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Buḫārī wa-bi-hāmišihi matn Ṣaḥīḥ al-Imām Muslim wa-šarḥ al-imām al-Nawawī ʻalayhi (Būlāq: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Kubrā al-Amīriyya, 1304).

entry.citation: al-Qayrawānī, Ibn Abī Zayd and Ṣāliḥ ʻAbd al-Samīʻ al-Ābī al-Azharī n.d.

reference.div: al-Qayrawānī, Ibn Abī Zayd and Ṣāliḥ ʻAbd al-Samīʻ al-Ābī al-Azharī n.d. Risālat al-Imām Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī wa bi-hamišihā al-šarḥ al-musammā al-Ṯamar al-dānī fī taqrīb al-maʻānī (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Qāhira, ).

entry.citation: al-Qazwīnī, ʻAlī b. ʻUmar et al. 1311

reference.div: al-Qazwīnī, ʻAlī b. ʻUmar, al-Ǧurǧānī, ʻAlī b. Muḥammad, and al-Rāzī, Quṭb al-Dīn Maḥmūd b. Muḥammad 1311. Taḥrīr al-qawāʻid al-manṭiqiyya fī šarḥ al-Risāla al-šamsiyya [...] wa-bi-hāmišihi Ḥāšiyat al-Sayyid ʻAlī b. Muḥammad al-Ǧurǧānī ʻalā šarḥ Quṭb al-Dīn al-Rāzī ʻalā Matn al-Šamsiyya (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Azhariyya, 1311).

entry.citation: al-Qināwī, Masʻūd b. Ḥasan b. Abī Bakr 1346

reference.div: al-Qināwī, Masʻūd b. Ḥasan b. Abī Bakr 1346. Fatḥ al-raḥīm al-raḥmān (al-Qāhira: Muḥammad ʻAlī Ṣubayḥ wa-Awlāduhu, 1346).

entry.citation: al-Qušayrī, Abū al-Qāsim and Zakariyyā al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā 1359

reference.div: al-Qušayrī, Abū al-Qāsim and Zakariyyā al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā 1359. al-Risāla al-qušayriyya ... wa-bi-al-hāmiš muntaḫabāt min šarḥ Abī Yaḥyā Zakariyyā al-Anṣārī, ed. Aḥmad Saʻd ʻAlī (al-Qāhira: al-Ḥalabī, 1359).
al-Quḍāʻī, Muḥammad b. Salāma 1326. al-Šihāb fī al-ḥikam wa-al-amṯāl (1326).

entry.citation: al-Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad and Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā 1347

reference.div: al-Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad and Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā 1347. al-Minaḥ al-fikriyya šarḥ matn al-Ǧazariyya ... wa-bi-hāmišihi šarḥ al-ʻallāma Šayḫ al-islām Zakarīyā’ al-Anṣārī ʻalā al-Muqaddima al-ǧazariyya ayḍan (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1347).

entry.citation: al-Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad and Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā 1367

reference.div: al-Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad and Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī, Abū Yaḥyā 1367. al-Minaḥ al-fikriyya šarḥ al-Muqaddima al-ǧazariyya ... wa-bi-hāmišihā šarḥ Abī Yaḥyā Zakariyyā’ al-Anṣārī ʻalā al-Muqaddima al-ǧazariyya (Miṣr: Šarikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1367).
al-Qārī al-Harawī, ‘Alī b. Sulṭān Muḥammad 1316. Šarḥ al-šifā’ (Istanbul: Dār Saʻādāt, 1316).
al-Qāšānī, ʻAbd al-Razzāq n.d. Tafsīr al-šayḫ al-akbar (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya - Muṣṭafā al_Bābī al-Ḥalabī, ).

entry.citation: al-Qāḍī Abī al-Faḍl ʻAyāḍ al-Yaḥṣabī and al-Šūmunnī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 2000

reference.div: al-Qāḍī Abī al-Faḍl ʻAyāḍ al-Yaḥṣabī and al-Šūmunnī, Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Muḥammad 2000. al-Šīfā’ bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣtafā - Muzīl al-ḫafā’ ʻan al-fāẓ al-šīfā’, ed. ʻAbd al-Salām Muḥammad Amīn (Bayūt: Muḥammad ʻAlī Bayḍūn - Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2000).

entry.citation: al-Rāfiʻī, ʻAbd al-Karīm b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Karīm 1428

reference.div: al-Rāfiʻī, ʻAbd al-Karīm b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Karīm 1428. Šarḥ musnad al-Šāfiʻī, ed. Abū Bakr Wā’il Muḥammad Bakr Zahrān (al-Riyāḍ: Wuzārat al-awqāf wa-al-šu’ūn al-islāmiyya, 1428).
al-Rāzī 1424. Tuḥfat al-mulūk fī maḏhab al-aḥnāf, ed. Muḥammad Walī b. al-Ḥāǧǧ Aḥmad b. ʿUmar (Addis Ababa: Maktabat mu’assasat al-naǧāšī, 1424).
al-Rāzī, Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr 1417. Tuḥfat al-mulūk fī fiqh maḏhab al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfa al-Nuʻmān, ed. ʻAbd Allāh Nadīr Aḥmad (Bayrūt: Dār al-Bašā’ir al-Islāmiyya, 1417).

entry.citation: al-Rāzī, Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr Zayn al-Dīn and al-ʻUkbarī, Muḥibb al-Dīn Abū al-Baqā’ ʻAbd Allāh b. al-Ḥusayn b. ʻAbd Allāh n.d.

reference.div: al-Rāzī, Muḥammad b. Abī Bakr Zayn al-Dīn and al-ʻUkbarī, Muḥibb al-Dīn Abū al-Baqā’ ʻAbd Allāh b. al-Ḥusayn b. ʻAbd Allāh n.d. Imlā’ mā manna bihi al-raḥmān min wuǧūh al-iʻrāb wa-al-qirā’āt fī ǧamīʻ al-Qur’ān - wa buhāmišihi Umnūḏaǧ ǧalīl fī bayān as’ila wa aǧwiba min ġarā’ib Āy al-tanzīl (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya - Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, ).

al-Samarqandī, Naṣrb.Muḥammad s.a. Tanbīh al-ġāfilīn li-al-faqīh [...] Naṣr b. Muḥammad b. Ibrāhīm al-Samarqandī wa-bi-hāmišihi Bustān al-ʻārifīn li-al-mu’allif ayḍan (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Dār iḥyā’ al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya Īsā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Šurakāhu, s.a.).

entry.citation: al-Samhūdī, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. ʻAfīf 1326

reference.div: al-Samhūdī, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. ʻAfīf 1326. Wafā’ al-wafā (2) bi-aḫbār dār al-muṣṭafā (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-Ādāb wa-al-Mu’ayyad, 1326).

entry.citation: al-Samhūdī, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. ʻAfīf al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh, al-Šāfiʻī 1971

reference.div: al-Samhūdī, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī b. ʻAfīf al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh, al-Šāfiʻī 1971. Wafā’ al-wafā bi-aḫbār dār al-muṣṭafā (Beirut: Dār Iḥyā’ al-turāṯ al-ʻarabī, 1971).
al-Sammān, Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Karīm 1908. Mawlid al-nabī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-taqaddum, 1908).
al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Hāšimī 2007. Muḫtār al-aḥādīṯ al-nabawiyya wa al-ḥikam al-muḥammadiyya (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2007).

entry.citation: al-Sayyid Muḥammad b. ʻAlawī al-Mālikī al-Ḥasanī n.d.

reference.div: al-Sayyid Muḥammad b. ʻAlawī al-Mālikī al-Ḥasanī n.d. al-Madḥ al-nabawī bayn al-ġuluww wa al-inṣāf, Silsila Īḍāḥ mafāhīm al-sunna al-nabawiyya, 1 (al-Qāhira: Dār Wahdān liìl-Ṭibāʻa wa al-Našr, ).
al-Sayyid Sābiq 1389. Fiqh al-sunna (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kitāb al-ʻArabī, 1389).

entry.citation: al-Sayyid al-Bakrī al-Makkī Ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad Šāṭā and Muḥammad Nawawī 1325

reference.div: al-Sayyid al-Bakrī al-Makkī Ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad Šāṭā and Muḥammad Nawawī 1325. Kifāyat al-atqiyā’ wa minhāǧ al-aṣfiyā’ - wa bi-hāmišihi Salālim al-fuḍalā’ li-ḫātimat al-awliyā’ (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya al-Kubrā, 1325).
al-Sayyid Ǧaʻfar Murtaḍā al-ʻĀmilī 1987. al-Mawāsim wa al-marāsim (Teheran: Muʻāwuniyyat al-ʻAlāqāt al_Dawliyya fī Munaẓẓama al-Aʻlām al-Islāmī, 1987).
al-Sayyid ʻAlī al-Ḥusaynī al-Ḫāmene’ī 1995. Aǧwibat al-istiftā’āt (Bayrūt: Dār al-Wasīla li-al-ṭabāʻa wa-al-našr wa-al-tawzīʻ, 1995).
al-Saḫāwī, Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1388. Fatḥ al-muġīṯ (2) šarḥ Alfiyyat al-ḥadīṯ li-al-ʻIrāqī, ed. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ʻUṯmān (al-Madīna al-munawwara: al-Maktaba al-salafiyya, 1388).

entry.citation: al-Subkī, Tāǧ al-Dīn Abū al-Naṣr b. Taqī al-Dīn ʻAlī 1324

reference.div: al-Subkī, Tāǧ al-Dīn Abū al-Naṣr b. Taqī al-Dīn ʻAlī 1324. Ṭabaqāt al-šāfiʻiyya al-kubrā (2) ([Cairo]: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Ḥusayniyya, 1324).
al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn 1983. al-Durr al-manṯūr fī al-tafsīr bi’l-ma’ṯūr (Bayrūt: Dār al-Fikr, 1983).
al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn 1991. Rafʻ ša’n al-ḥubšān (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Ṯaqāfa al-Dīniyya, 1991).
al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn 1995. Azhār al-ʻurūš fī aḫbār al-ḥubūš, ed. ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ʻĪsā Ġazālī (al-Kuwayt: Markaz al-Maḫṭūṭāt wa-al-Turāṯ wa-al-Waṯā’iq, 1995).
al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1356. al-Ašbāh wa-al-naẓā’ir fī qawā’id wa-furūʻ fiqh al-šāfiʻī, ed. Muḥammad Ḥāmid al-Faqī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1356).
al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1389. Ta’rīḫ al-ḫulafā’ (Bayrūt: Dār al-turāṯ, 1389).
al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān 1956. al-Kanz al madfūn wa-al-fulk al-mašḥūn (al-Qāhira: Muṣṭāfā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa awlādiḥi bi-Miṣr, 1956).

entry.citation: al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān and Mālik b. Anas n.d.

reference.div: al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān and Mālik b. Anas n.d. Tanwīr al-ḥawālik šarḥ ʻalā Muwaṭṭa’ Mālik ... wa-li-tamām al-nafʻ bi waḍaʻnā matn al-Muwaṭṭa’ mafṣūlan ... bi-aʻlā kull ṣafḥa ... wa-yalīhi Kitāb Isʻāf al-mubaṭṭa’ bi-riǧāl al-Muwaṭṭā’ li-al-Suyūṭī (Cairo: Dār Iḥyā’ al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya, ).

entry.citation: al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān and al-Bāqillānī, al-Qāḍī Abū Bakr 1870

reference.div: al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān and al-Bāqillānī, al-Qāḍī Abū Bakr 1870. al-Itqān fī ʻulūm al-Qur’ān wa-bi-al-hāmiš Iʻǧāz al-Qur’ān (Miṣr: Šarikat maktabat wa-maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlādihi, 1870).

entry.citation: al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Abī Bakr 1352

reference.div: al-Suyūṭī, Ǧalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Abī Bakr 1352. al-Ḥāwī li-al-fatāwī fī al-fiqh wa-ʻulūm al-tafsīr wa-al-ḥadīṯ wa-al-uṣūl wa-al-naḥw wa-al-iʻrāb wa-sā’ir al-funūn (al-Qāhira: al-Ṭibāʻa al-Munīriyya, 1352).
