Ǧamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Annī 1424. Ǧāmiʻ al-fatāwā al-Annī li-al-Šayḫ Ǧamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Annī (1424).

entry.citation: Ǧamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Ašḫar al-Yamanī and Yaḥyā b. Abī Bakr Muḥammad b. Yaḥyā al-ʻAmirī al-Ḥaraḍī al-Yamanī 1330

reference.div: Ǧamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Ašḫar al-Yamanī and Yaḥyā b. Abī Bakr Muḥammad b. Yaḥyā al-ʻAmirī al-Ḥaraḍī al-Yamanī 1330. Kitāb Šarḥ [...] ʻalā kitāb Bahǧat al-maḥāfil wa-buġyat al-amāṯil fī talḫīṣ al-mu‘ǧizāt wa-al-siyar wa-al-šamā’il (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻa al-Ǧamāliyya, 1330).
Ǧamāl al-Dīn al-Annī 1337. Kifāyat al-ṭālibīn (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻat Maṭar, 1337).

Ǧamāl al-Dīn al-Annī 1433. al-Naǧm al-munīr, fī iršād man yurīd al-safar ilā al-āḫira wa-yasīr, ed. Muḥammad b. Ḥāmī al-Dīn b. ʻAbd al-Ṣamad al-Wollowī al-Būranī, Silsilat mu’allifāt al-Šayḫ ... Ǧamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Annī (Addīs Abābā: Maktabat al-Sunna, 1433).

Ǧamīl Ṣidqī al-Zahāwī, Ẓāhir Šāh Mayān b. ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm, and Muṣṭafā b. Aḥmad b. Ḥasan al-Šaṭṭī 1998. al-Faǧr al-ṣādiq fī al-radd ʻalā munkirī al-tawassul wa-al-karamāt wa-al-ḫawāriq [...] wa-yalīhā Ḍiyā’ al-ṣuḍūr wa-yalīhumā al-Nuqūl al-šarʻiyya, ed. Hüseyin Hilmi Işık (Istanbul: Hakīkat kitābevi, 1998).

Ǧawhar b. Ḥaydar 1324. al-Ǧawāhir al-ḥaydariyya fī al-ʻaqā’id al-dīniyya ... wa-bi-hāmišihi Taqrīrāt šarīfa wa-ḥawāš munīfa muǧarrada min ḫaṭṭ al-mu’allif al-maḏkūr, ed. Muḥammad al-Zuhrī al-Ġamrāwī (Miṣr: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymana, 1324).
Ǧawhar b. Ḥaydar b. ʻAlī 1348. al-Bidʻa al-saniyya ʻalā al-lumʻa al-bahiyya (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-Maʻāhid, 1348).
Ǧaʻfar al-Subḥānī 1407. al-Wahhābiyya fī al-mīzān (Mu’assasat al-našr al-islāmī al-tābiʻa bi-ǧamāʻat al-mudarrisīn bi-Qum al-mušarrafa, 1407).

entry.citation: Ǧaʻfar b. Ismāʻīl b. Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn al-Barzanǧī 1303

reference.div: Ǧaʻfar b. Ismāʻīl b. Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn al-Barzanǧī 1303. Nuzhat al-nāẓirīn fī masǧid sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-āḫirīn (al-Maṭbaʻa al-mīriyya al-kā’ina bi-Makka al-maḥmīya, 1303).

entry.citation: Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan b. ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Barzanǧī n.d.a

reference.div: Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan b. ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Barzanǧī n.d. Manẓūmat Ahl Badr al-musammāt bi-Ǧāliyyat al-Kadar (Singapore: Maṭbaʻat Sulaymān Marʻī, ).

entry.citation: Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan b. ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Barzanǧī n.d.b

reference.div: Ǧaʻfar b. Ḥasan b. ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Barzanǧī n.d. Ǧāliyyat al-Kadar bi-Ḏikr Ahl Badr wa Šuhadā’ Uḥud al-Sāda al-Ġurar, ed. Muḥammad ʻAlawī al-Mālikī al-Ḥasanī (Surābāyā (Indonesia): Dār al-Saqqāf, ).
ʻAbbās Karārah s.a. al-Dīn wa-al-haǧǧ ʻalā al-maḏāhib al-arbaʻa manāsik al-ḥaǧǧ wa-al-ʻumra wa-ziyārat al-madīna bi-al-ṣuwar (al-Makka al-Mukarrama: Maktabat ʻAbd Allāh Fidā wa-awlāduhu, s.a.).

entry.citation: ʻAbd Allāh b. Aḥmad al-Fākihī and al-ʻUlaymī, Yāsīn b. Zayn al-Dīn 1347

reference.div: ʻAbd Allāh b. Aḥmad al-Fākihī and al-ʻUlaymī, Yāsīn b. Zayn al-Dīn 1347. Ḥāšiyat al-ʻallāma al-Šayḫ Yāsīn ʻalā šarḥ al-Fākihī ʻalā Qaṭr al-nadā, ed. Muḥammad Kāmil b. Muḥammad al-Asyūṭī al-Azharī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat al-Taqaddum al-ʻIlmiyya, 1347).

entry.citation: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Fākihī 1327

reference.div: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Fākihī 1327. Kašf al-niqāb ʻan Mulḥat al-iʻrāb li-al-imām ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Fākihī - wa-bi-hāmišihi taqrīrāt li-baʻḍa al-afāḍil (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1327).

entry.citation: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Fākihī 1351

reference.div: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Fākihī 1351. Kašf al-niqāb šarḥ al-imām al-fāḍil ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. Aḥmad al-Fākihī ʻan muḫaddarāt mulḥat al-iʻrāb li-al-ustāḏ ... Abī Muḥammad al-Qāsim b. ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī bi-asfal al-ṣaḥā’if taqrīrāt li-afāḍil al-ʻulamā’ (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1351).

entry.citation: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḫalīfī S. A.

reference.div: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd Allāh b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ḫalīfī S. A. Kitāb al-Ṯaqāfa al-ʻamma wa-al-durūs al-hamma (S. L: S. A.).

entry.citation: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Wahhāb 1396

reference.div: ʻAbd Allāh b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Wahhāb 1396. Muḫtaṣar sīrat al-rasūl ṣalā Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ed. Muḥibb al-Dīn al-Ḫaṭīb (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Salafiyya wa-Maktabatuhā, 1396).
ʻAbd Allāh b. al-Muqaffaʻ 1934. Kalīla wa-Dimna, ed. Muḥammad Ḥasan Nā’il al-Marṣafī (Maṭbaʻat al-Ḫāzandār, 1934).

entry.citation: ʻAbd Allāh b. Ḥusayn Ḫāṭir al-ʻAdawī 1356

reference.div: ʻAbd Allāh b. Ḥusayn Ḫāṭir al-ʻAdawī 1356. Ḥāšiyat laqṭ al-durar bi-šarḥ matn Nuḫbat al-fikar (Cairo: Šarikat wa-maktabat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-awlādihi bi-Miṣr, 1356).
ʻAbd Allāh ʻUlwān 1401. Tarbiyat al-awlād fī al-islām (Bayrūt - Ḥalab: Dār al-Salām li-al-Ṭibāʻa wa-al-Našr wa-al-Tawzīʻ, 1401).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Bāsiṭ b. Muḥammad Ḥalīma al-Būranī 2003

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Bāsiṭ b. Muḥammad Ḥalīma al-Būranī 2003. Mudnī al-ḥabīb mimman yuwālī muġnī al-labīb, ed. Muḥammad b. šayḫ ʻAlī b. Ādam al-Ityūbī (Addis Ababa-Beirut: Maktabat Muṣʻab b, ʻAmīr al-islāmiyya - mu’assasat al-kutub al-ṯaqafiyya, 2003).
ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Maṭarī al-Dimyāṭī 1886. Ḥāšiyat ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Maṭarī al-Dimyāṭī ʻalā šarḥ al-Šihāb al-Ramlī ʻalā al-sittīn mas’ala (Cairo: 1886).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Sammān and al-Muʻāyyinī, Maḥmūd b. ʻAbd al-Qādir n.d.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Sammān and al-Muʻāyyinī, Maḥmūd b. ʻAbd al-Qādir n.d. Bahǧat al-Asrār fī Madḥ al-Muḫtār : Majmūʻ Qaṣā’id Muḫtāra wa-Maǧmūʻat Qaṣā’id al-Šāyḫ Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Muʻayyinī (Dīwān), ed. al-Zāwiya al-Qādiriyya.
ʻAbd al-Malik b. Hišām 1404. al-Sīra al-nabawiyya li-Ibn Hišām, ed. Ṭaha ʻAbd al-Ra’ūf Saʻd (al-Qāhira: Maktabat al-Kulliyya al-Azhariyya, 1404).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Maǧīd al-Šarnūbī and Aḥmad b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAṭā’ Allāh 1304

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Maǧīd al-Šarnūbī and Aḥmad b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAṭā’ Allāh 1304. Šarḥ Tā’iyyat al-sulūk wa-ʻalā hāmiš hāḏa al-kitāb šarhuhu ʻalā Ḥikam Ibn ʻAṭā’ Allāh (al-Qāhira: 1304).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Maḥmūd b. Nūr al-Dā’im b. Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib 1954

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Maḥmūd b. Nūr al-Dā’im b. Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib 1954. Azāhīr al-riyāḍ fī manāqib al-ʻārif bi-Allāh al-šayḫ Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib, eds Muḥammad al-Hādī Qarīb Allāh and Ṭāhā Muḥammad al-Mubārak (Khartoum: Maṭbaʻat Miṣr, 1954).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Maḥmūd b. Nūr al-Dā’im b. Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib 1955

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Maḥmūd b. Nūr al-Dā’im b. Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib 1955. al-ʻArf al-fā’iḥ wa-al-ḍiyā’ al-lā’iḥ fī manāqib al-quṭb al-rāǧiḥ wa-al-ġawṯ al-wāḍiḥ sayyidī al-ustāḏ al-šayḫ Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib ibn al-Bašīr (Omdurman: Aḥmad al-Badawī al-Sammānī, 1955).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Maḥmūd b. Nūr al-Dā’im b. Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib 1971

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Maḥmūd b. Nūr al-Dā’im b. Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib 1971. al-Manāqib al-ṣuġrā li-sayyidī al-šayḫ Aḥmad al-Ṭayyib b. al-Bašīr (al-Qāhira: Aḥmad al-Badawī al-Sammānī, 1971).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Munʻim ʻIwaḍ al-Ǧirǧāwī and Muḥammad Quṭṭa al-ʻAdawī 1355

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Munʻim ʻIwaḍ al-Ǧirǧāwī and Muḥammad Quṭṭa al-ʻAdawī 1355. Šarḥ al-šayḫ ʻAbd al-Munʻim ʻIwaḍ al-Ǧirǧāwī ... ʻalā Šawāhid Ibn ʻAqīl li-Alfiyyat al-imām Ibn Mālik wa-bi-al-hāmiš Fatḥ al-ǧalīl bi-šarḥ Šawāhid Ibn ʻAqīl, ed. Aḥmad Saʻd ʻAlī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-awlāduhu, 1355).
ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī 1292. Bašā’ir al-ḫayrāt (al-Qāhira: 1292).
ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī 1357. Ṣalawāt mansūba li-ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1357).
ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī 2000. Al-fuyūḍāt al-rabbāniyya fī al-maʼāṯir wa-l-awrād al-Qādiriyya (al-Qāhira: al-Maktaba al-Azhariyya li-l-turāṯ, 2000).
ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī n. d. Al-fuyūḍāt al-rabbāniyya (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat al-umma Bahǧat al-darb al-aḥmar, n. d.).
ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧīlānī s.d. Dīwān ʻAbd al-Qādir, ed. Yūsuf Zaydān (Bayrūt: Dār al-Ǧīl, s.d.).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Qādir b. Aḥmad al-Ḫaṭīb al-Ṭarābulusī 1312

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Qādir b. Aḥmad al-Ḫaṭīb al-Ṭarābulusī 1312. Risāla fī taḥrīr al-maqādīr al-šarʻiyya ʻalā maḏhab al-a’imma al-arbaʻa al-muǧtahidīn (Būlāq: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Amīriyya, 1312).
ʻAbd al-Razzāq Nawfal 1957. al-Islām wa al-ʻilm al-ḥadīṯ (Miṣr: Maktabat Miṣr / Dār Miṣr li-al-ṭabāʻa, 1957).
ʻAbd al-Razzāq Nawfal n.d. al-Islām wa al-ʻilm al-ḥadīṯ (al-Faǧǧāla [al-Qāhira]: Maktaba al-Waʻī al-ʻArabī - Dār al-Ǧīl, ).

ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Rifa’at al-Bāšā 1990. Ṣuwar min ḥayāt al-ṣaḥāba - al-Qirā’a al-iḍāfiyya li’l-ṣaff al-awwal al-mutawassiṭ - al-ǧuz’ al-ṯānī, ed. al-Idāra al-ʻĀmma li’l-Manāhiǧ bi’l-Taṭwīr al-Tarbawī (Jedda: Dār al-Iṣfahānī - al-Mamlaka al-ʻArabiyya al-Saʻūdiyya - Wizārat al-Maʻārif al-Taṭwīr al-tarbawī - al-Idāra al-ʻĀmmā li’l-Manāhiǧ, 1990).
ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ǧazīrī 1986. Kitāb al-fiqh ʻalā al-maḏāhib al-arbaʻa (Bayrūt: 1986).
ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ǧazīrī 1990. Kitāb al-fiqh ʻalā al-maḏāhib al-arbaʻa (3) (Beirut: Dār al-Fikr, 1990).
ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ǧazīrī s.a. Kitāb al-Fiqh ʻalā al-maḏāhib al-arbaʻa (4) (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻat Dār al-Mamūn, s.a.).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ṣafūrī al-Šāfiʻī and ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Dīrīnī n.d.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ṣafūrī al-Šāfiʻī and ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Dīrīnī n.d. Nuzhat al-maǧālis wa muntaḫab al-nafā’is wa bi-hāmišihā kitāb Ṭahārat al-qulūb wal-ḫuḍūʻ li-ʻallām al-ġuyūb (al-Qāhira: ʻĪsā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa Šurakā’hu, ).

ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad Bāʻalawī 1998. Buġyat al-mustaršidīn fī talḫīṣ fatāwā baʻḍ al-a’imma min al-ʻulamā’ al-muta’aḫḫirīn, maʻa ḍamm fawā’id ǧamma min kutub šattā li-al-ʻulamā’ al-muǧtahidīn, eds ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. ʻAbd al-Karīm Ibn Ziyād and ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad Bāṣabrayn (Bayrūt: Manšūrāt Muḥammad ʻAlī Bayḍūn, Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 1998).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad Ibn Qudāma and Muwaffaq al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh b. Aḥmad Ibn Qudāma 19...

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad Ibn Qudāma and Muwaffaq al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh b. Aḥmad Ibn Qudāma 19... al-Šarḥ al-kabīr ʻalā matn al-Muqniʻ (Cairo: Dār al-Fikr, 19...).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad b. Yaḫlaftan b. Aḥmad b. Taflīt al-Fāzāzī al-Yaǧfašī Abū Zayd et al. 1338

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad b. Yaḫlaftan b. Aḥmad b. Taflīt al-Fāzāzī al-Yaǧfašī Abū Zayd, Abū Bakr Muḥammad al-Mahīb, Yūsuf al-Nabahānī, and Ibn Ǧābir al-Andalusī 1338. Dīwān al-Wasā’il al-mutaqabbila fī madḥ al-Nabī ... wa-taḫmīsuhu li-al-Šayḫ al-imām Abī Bakr Muḥammad al-Mahīb...wa-yalīhi qaṣīdatayn (1) al-Sābiqāt al-ǧiyād (2) Qasīdat madḥ al-nabī fī al-tawriya bi-suwar al-Qur’ān (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1338).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad b. Yaḫlaftan b. Aḥmad b. Taflīt al-Fāzāzī al-Yaǧfašī Abū Zayd et al. 1950

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad b. Yaḫlaftan b. Aḥmad b. Taflīt al-Fāzāzī al-Yaǧfašī Abū Zayd, al-Ġamrāwī, Muḥammad al-Zuhrī, Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn ʻAlī b. al-Ḥusayn b. ʻAlī b. Abī Ṭālib, and ʻUmar b. Abī Bakr b. ʻUṯmān al-Kebbawī 1950. al-Qaṣā’id al-ʻašariyya wa-maʻahā Šarḥ ʻibārātihā al-muǧāziyya wa-tafsīr alfāẓihā al-luġawiyya; wa-yalīhā ṯalāṯa kutub: (1) al-Zuhd wa-al-waṣiyya, (2) Tarbīʻ Kitāb al-Zuhd wa-al-waṣīyya, (3) Kitāb al-Sariǧa al-warīqa fī ʻilm al-waṯīqa (Cairo: ʻĪsā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1950).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad b. Yaḫlaftan b. Aḥmad b. Taflīt al-Fāzāzī al-Yaǧfašī Abū Zayd et al. s.a.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥammad b. Yaḫlaftan b. Aḥmad b. Taflīt al-Fāzāzī al-Yaǧfašī Abū Zayd, Abū Bakr Muḥammad al-Mahīb, Yūsuf al-Nabahānī, and Ibn Ǧābir al-Andalusī s.a. al-Wasā’il al-mutaqabbila fī madḥ al-Nabī ... wa-taḫmīsuhu li-al-Šayḫ al-imām Abī Bakr Muḥammad al-Mahīb...wa-yalīhi qaṣīdatayn (1) al-Sābiqāt al-ǧiyād (2) Qasīdat madḥ al-nabī fī al-tawriya bi-suwar al-Qur’ān (Cairo: Maktabat wa-maṭbaʻat al-Mašhad al-Ḥusaynī, s.a.).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥāmmad Bāʻlāwī and ʻAlī Bāṣīrī 1325

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥāmmad Bāʻlāwī and ʻAlī Bāṣīrī 1325. Kitāb Buġyat al-mustaršidīn (2) fī talḫīṣ fatāwā ba‘ḍ al-a’imma min al-‘ulamā’ al-muta’aḫḫirīn [...] wa-bi-hāmišihi Kitāb Iṯmiḏ al-ʻaynayn fī baʻḍ iḫtilāf al-šayḫayn Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī wa-al-Šams al-Ramlī [...] ṯumma yalīhi bi-al-hāmiš ayḍan Kitāb Ġāyat Talḫīṣ al-Murād min Fatāwā Ibn Ziyād (Cairo: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1325).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥāmmad Bāʻlāwī and ʻAlī Bāṣīrī 1952

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Muḥāmmad Bāʻlāwī and ʻAlī Bāṣīrī 1952. Kitāb Buġyat al-Mustaršidīn fī Talḫīṣ Fatāwā baʻḍ al-A’imma min al-ʻUlamā’ al-muta’aḫḫirīn maʻa ḍamm fawā’id ǧamma min kutub šattā wa bi-hāmišihi Ġāyat talḫīṣ almrād min Fatāwā Ibn Ziyād wa bi-hāmišihi ayḍan Kitāb Iṯmiḏ al-ʻaynayn fī baʻḍ iḫtilāf al-šāyḫayn Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī wa alŠams al-Ramlī ([al-Qāhira]: [Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī], 1952).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Sulaymān b. Yaḥyā b. ʻUmar al-Ahdal 1876

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Sulaymān b. Yaḥyā b. ʻUmar al-Ahdal 1876. Fatāwā al-Ahdal (1876).
ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Yūsuf al-Afrīqī 1396. al-Anwār al-Raḥmāniyya li-hidāyat al-firqat al-Tīǧāniyya (Madīna: al-Ǧāmiʻat al-Islāmiyya fī Madīna, 1396).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. ʻAlī al-Rabīʻī al-Zubaydī n.d.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. ʻAlī al-Rabīʻī al-Zubaydī n.d. Maǧmūʻ mubārak yaḥtawī ʻalā al-mawlid al-šarīf (Aden: Maktaba li-al-ṯaqāfa, ).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Ḥasan Āl al-Šayḫ 1397

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Ḥasan Āl al-Šayḫ 1397. Fatḥ al-maǧīd šarḥ Kitāb al-tawḥīd, ed. ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz b. ʻAbd Allāh b. Bāz (al-Madīna al-munawwara: al-Maktaba al-salafiyya, 1397).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Ṣāliḥ Āl Bassām 2002

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Ṣāliḥ Āl Bassām 2002. Taysīr al-ʻallām šarḥ ʻUmdat al-aḥkām, ed. ʻAbd al-Ġanī b. ʻAbd al-Wāḥid Ǧammāʻīlī (Cairo, Alexandria: Dār al-ʻAqīda, 2002).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. Aḥmad al-Qāḍī and al-Suyūṭī, Abū al-Faḍl ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Abī Bakr 1306

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. Aḥmad al-Qāḍī and al-Suyūṭī, Abū al-Faḍl ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. Abī Bakr 1306. Daqā’iq al-aḫbār fī ḏikr al-ǧanna wa-al-nār wa-bi-hāmišihi Durar al-ḥisān fī al-baʻṯ wa-al-ǧinān lil-Suyūṭī (al-Qāhira: Aḥmad al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1306).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Nabāta n.d.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. Muḥammad b. Ismāʻīl b. Nabāta n.d. Ḫuṭab Ibn Nubāta (Singapore: Maktabat wa-maṭbaʻat Sulaymān Marʻī, ).
ʻAbd al-Raḥīm b. al-Ḥusayn ʻIrāqī 1988. Alfiyyat al-Ḥadīṯ, eds Aḥmad Muḥammad Šākir and Maḥmūd Rabīʻ (Cairo: Maktabat al-Sunnah, 1988).
ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī 2005. Alfiyyat al-sīra al-nabawiyyah al-musammā Naẓm al-durar al-saniyya fī al-siyar al-zakiyyah, ed. Muḥammad ʻAlawī Mālikī (Bayrūt: Dār al-Minhāǧ, 2005).
ʻAbd al-Salām al-Qādirī 1350. al-Maqṣad al-aḥmad fī al-taʻrīf bi-sayyidinā Ibn ʻAbd Allāh Aḥmad (Fās: 1350).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Salām b. Ibrāhīm al- Laqānī 1994

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Salām b. Ibrāhīm al- Laqānī 1994. Šarḥ: Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Ǧawharat al-tawḥīd, ed. Fatḥī Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Rāziq (Cairo: Maṭbaʻat al-Ḥusayn al-Islāmiyya, 1994).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Wahhāb b. Aḥmad b. ʻAlī al-Šaʻrānī 2004

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Wahhāb b. Aḥmad b. ʻAlī al-Šaʻrānī 2004. Lawāqiḥ al-anwār al-qudsiyyah fī al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadiyyah, ed. Nawāf al-Ǧarrāḥ (Bayrūt: Dār Ṣādir, 2004).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Waṣīf Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raḥmān n.d.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Waṣīf Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raḥmān n.d. ʻIlm al-manṭiq al-ḥadīṯ wa al-qadīm ʻalā al-niẓām al-ṣaḥīḥ wa al-naẓm al-qawīm ([al-Qāhira]: al-Ǧāmiʻa al-ʻIlmiyya al-Azhariyya, ).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ġanī al-Nābulusī and Muḥammad b. Sīrīn 1890

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ġanī al-Nābulusī and Muḥammad b. Sīrīn 1890. Taʻtīr al-anām fī tafsīr al-aḥlām [...] wa-bi-hāmišihā al-kitāb al-musammā Muntaḫab al-kalām fī tafsīr al-aḥlām [...] (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-maymaniyya, 1890).
ʻAbd al-Ġānī al-Nābulusī 2007. Rā’iḥat al-ǧanna bi-šarḥ iḍā’at al-duǧunna (Bayrūt: Dār al-kutub al-‘ilmiyya, 2007).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm 1347

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm 1347. Tanbīh al-anām (3) fī bayān ʻulūw maqām nabiyyinā Muḥammad ʻalayhi al-ṣalāt wa-al-salām, ed. Ibrāhīm b. Ḥasan al-Inbābī (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1347).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm 1386

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm 1386. Tanbīh al-anām (2) fī bayān ʻulūw maqām nabiyyinā Muḥammad ʻalayhi al-ṣalāt wa-al-salām, ed. Ibrāhīm b. Ḥasan al-Inbābī (Addis Ababa: Maṭbaʻat Addīs, 1386).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm 1930

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm 1930. Tanbīh al-anām fī bayān ʻulūw maqām nabiyyinā Muḥammad ʻalayhi al-ṣalāt wa-al-salām (al-Qāhira: al-Maktaba al-Tiǧāriyya al-Kubrā, 1930).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm s.a.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ǧalīl b. Muḥammad Ibn ʻAẓẓūm s.a. Tanbīh al-anām (4) fī bayān ʻulūw maqām nabiyyinā Muḥammad ʻalayhi al-ṣalāt wa-al-salām, ed. Ibrāhīm b. Ḥasan al-Inbābī (Singapore: Sulaymān Marʻī, s.a.).
ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz Sayyid al-Ahl 1353. al-Ḫalīfa al-zāhid ʻUmar b. ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz (Bayrūt: Dār al-ʻIlm al-Malāyīn, 1353).
ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz Sayyid al-Ahl 1975. al-Ḫalīfa al-zāhid ʻUmar b. ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz (Bayrūt: Dār al-ʻIlm al-Malāyīn, 1975).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Salmān 1409

reference.div: ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz b. Muḥammad b. ʻAbd al-Raḥmān b. ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Salmān 1409. Maǧmūʻa al-qaṣāʼid al-zuhdiyyāt (al-Riyāḍ: 1409).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm b. ʻAbd al-Qawī al-Munḏirī 1373

reference.div: ʻAbd al-ʻAẓīm b. ʻAbd al-Qawī al-Munḏirī 1373. al-Tarġīb wal-tarhīb min al-ḥadīṯ al-šarīf, ed. Muṣṭafā Muḥammad ʻAmāra (Cairo: Šarikat maktabat wa-maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-awlāduhu, 1373).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm Maḥmūd and Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Ǧawwād n.d.

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm Maḥmūd and Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Ǧawwād n.d. Al-Islām, Arkān al-Islām, ed. al-Azhar al-Šarīf (al-Qāhira: ).
ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Quds 1330. Laṭā’if al-išārāt ilā šarḥ Tashīl al-ṭuruqāt (Cairo: 1330).

ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd al-Širwānī, Aḥmad b. Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī, and Aḥmad Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī 1357. Ḥawāšī Tuḥfat al-muḥtāǧ bi-šarḥ al-Minhāǧ li-al-ʻallāma [...] ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd al-Širwānī [...] wa-al-ʻallāma [...] Aḥmad b. Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī [...] wa-bi-hāmišihi Tuḥfat al-muḥtāǧ bi-šarḥ al-Minhāǧ (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-tiǧāriyya al-Kubrā, 1357).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq sibṭ al-ʻAllāma al-Nawawī al-ṯānī and al-Taftāzānī, Saʻd al-Dīn Masʻūd b. ʻUmar b. ʻAbd Allāh 1348

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq sibṭ al-ʻAllāma al-Nawawī al-ṯānī and al-Taftāzānī, Saʻd al-Dīn Masʻūd b. ʻUmar b. ʻAbd Allāh 1348. Tadrīǧ al-adānī ilā qirā’at šarḥ al-Saʻd ʻalā Taṣrīf al-Zanǧānī ... wa-bi-al-hāmiš al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr li-al-ḥibr al-Taftāzānī ʻalā matn al-Zanǧānī (Miṣr: Dār Iḥyā’ al-Kutub al-ʻArabiyya, 1348).

entry.citation: ʻAbdurrahman Kutti and Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī 1997

reference.div: ʻAbdurrahman Kutti and Ibn Ḥaǧar al-Haytamī 1997. Sabīl al-naǧāt ʻan bidʻat ahl al-zayġ wa-al-ḍallāla [...] wa-yalīhi kitābān (1) Kaff al-raʻāʻ ʻan muḥarramāt al-lahw wa-al-samāʻ, (2) al-Aʻlām bi-qawāṭiʻ al-islām (Istanbul: Hakīkat kitabevi, 1997).
ʻAlawī b. Aḥmad Saqqāf 2008. Maǧmūʻat ṯamān rasā’il šāfiʻiyya mufīda, ed. Muḥammad Ḥasan Muḥammad Ḥasan Ismāʻīl (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2008).

entry.citation: ʻAlā’ al-Dīn Abū Bakr b. Masʻūd al-Kāsānī al-Ḥanafī al-mulaqqab bi-Malik al-ʻUlamā’ 1910

reference.div: ʻAlā’ al-Dīn Abū Bakr b. Masʻūd al-Kāsānī al-Ḥanafī al-mulaqqab bi-Malik al-ʻUlamā’ 1910. Badā’iʻ al-ṣanā’iʻ fī tartīb al-šarā’iʻ (Cairo: Maṭbaʻah al-Ǧamāliyya, 1910).
ʻAlī Muḥammad al-Ḍabbāʻ (ed.) 1934. Maǧmūʻa mubāraka fī ṣalawāt mabrūra wa-adʻiya ma’ṯūra wa-aʻmāl maškūra (Miṣr: Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1934).
ʻAlī al-Maḥfūẓ 1958. Hidāyat al-muršidīn ilā ṭuruq al-waʻẓ wa al-ḫiṭāba ([al-Qāhira]: 1958).
ʻAlī b. Abī Ṭālib 1988. Dīwān amīr al-mu’minīn al-imām ʻAlī b. Abī Ṭālib, ed. ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz Karam ([Lubnān]: Mu’assasat al-kutub al-ṯaqāfiyya, 1988).
ʻAlī b. Aḥmad al-ʻAdawī 1416. Ḥāšiyat ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī ʻalā Šarḥ al-ʻizziyya li-al-šayḫ ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Zurqānī (Bayrūt: al-Maktaba al-ṯaqafiyya, 1416).

entry.citation: ʻAlī b. Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-ʻAzīzī al-Šāfiʻī and Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnī (al-Ḥifnāwī) 1377

reference.div: ʻAlī b. Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-ʻAzīzī al-Šāfiʻī and Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnī (al-Ḥifnāwī) 1377. al-Sirāǧ al-munīr šarḥ ... ʻalā al-Ǧāmiʻ al-ṣaġīr fī aḥādīṯ al-bašīr al-naḏīr ... wa-bi-hāmišihi Ḥāšiyat šayḫ al-islām Muḥammad b. Sālim al-Ḥifnī (Miṣr: Šarikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1377).
ʻIyāḍ b. Mūsā 1982. Mašāriq al-anwār ʻalā ṣiḥāḥ al-āṯār, ed. al-Bul‘amšī, Aḥmad Yaġan (Rabat: Wuzārat al-awqāf wal-šu’ūn al-islāmiyya, 1982).
ʻUbayda b. Muḥammad al-Ṣaġīr al-Šinqīṭī 1348. Mīzāb al-raḥma al-rabbāniyya fī al-tarbiyya bi’l-ṭarīqa al-Tiǧāniyya, ed. Ibrāhīm Ḥasan al-Inbābī (al-Qāhira: Muṣtafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī, 1348).
ʻUmar Abū al-Naṣr n.d. al-Hawā wa-al-šabāb wa-al-ḥaḍāra fī ʻahd al-Rašīd: waṣf al-ḥayāt fī Baġdād ʻāṣimat al-dunyā (Bayrūt: Maktab ʻUmar Abū al-Naṣr, ).
ʻUmar Barakāt b. Muḥammad Barakāt 1309. Fayḍ al-ilāh al-mālik fī ḥall alfāẓ ʻUmdat al-sālik, ed. Muḥammad al-Ḥusaynī (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻat al-Kubrā al-Amiriyya bi-Būlāq, 1309).

ʻUmar Mullā ʻAbd Allāh al-Saybardānī 2016. ‘Risāla taḏkirat al-iḫwān li-al-imām al-rabbānī Muḥammad b. Ibrāhīm al-ʻAlīǧī al-Qulahānṯ, Dirāsa wa-taḥqīq’, Journal of Humanity Sciences, 20/3 (2016), 72–89.
ʻUmar Riḍā Kaḥḥāla 1414. Muʻǧam al-mu’allifīn. Tarāǧim muṣannifī al-kutub al-ʻarabiyya (Bayrūt: Mu’assasa al-risāla, 1414).
ʻUmar b. Aḥmad al-Ḫarbūtī 1260. ʻAṣīdat al-šahda šarḥ Qaṣīdat al-Burda (Būlāq: 1260).
ʻUmar b. Muḥammad al-Suhrawardī 1939. Kitāb ʻawārif al-maʻārif (Miṣr: al-Maktaba al-ʻAlāmiyya, 1939).
ʻUmar b. Riḍā Kaḥḥāla 1957. Muʻǧam al-muʼallifīn (Shamela) (Bayrūt: Maktaba al-Muṯannā / Dār Iḥyā’ al-Ṯurāṯ al-ʻArabī, 1957).

entry.citation: ʻUmar b. Ǧaʻfar al-Šabrāwī and Muṣṭafā al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī 2006

reference.div: ʻUmar b. Ǧaʻfar al-Šabrāwī and Muṣṭafā al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī 2006. Šarḥ wird al-saḥar [...] wa-huwa al-musammā Iršād al-murīdīn ilā maʻrifat kalām al-ʻārifīn, ed. Maktab al-Rawḍa al-Šarīfa li-al-Baḥṯ al-ʻIlmī (al-Qāhira: al-Maktaba al-Azhariyya li-al-Turāṯ, 2006).

entry.citation: ʻUmar b. ʻAlī al-Balbalīttī al-Galamsī and Muḥammad Sirāǧ b. ʻUmar 1407

reference.div: ʻUmar b. ʻAlī al-Balbalīttī al-Galamsī and Muḥammad Sirāǧ b. ʻUmar 1407. Ǧawāhir al-durar, ed. Muḥammad Sirāǧ b. ʻUmar (Addis Ababa: 1407).

entry.citation: ʻUṯmān b. Ḥasan b. Aḥmad al-Ḫūbuwī 1327

reference.div: ʻUṯmān b. Ḥasan b. Aḥmad al-Ḫūbuwī 1327. Maǧālis kitāb Durrat al-wāʻiẓīn, ed. Muḥammad al-Zuhrī al-Ġumarī (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Maymaniyya, 1327).
ʻĪsā ʻAmmār 1380. al-Tafsīr al-ḥadīṯ li-al-Qur’ān al-karīm (al-Qāhira: Šarikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Muṣṭafā al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī wa-Awlāduhu, 1380).
ʾAbrǝha, Z.-M. Q. 1949. Ḥatatā manāfǝst (kaʾǝna tǝrgumu wa-’awda nagast) (Asmara: 1949).

ʾAfawarq Zawde, Qaḍalā Mangǝśtu, Malkǝʾa Krǝstos Nabiyu, and Kǝnafa Rǝgb ʾAttālal, eds, 1991. የግእዝ ቅኔያት የስነ ጥበብ ቅርስ። ሁለተኛ ክፍል። ንባቡ ከነትርጓሜው (Yagǝʾǝz qǝneyāt yasǝna ṭǝbab qǝrs. Hulataññā kǝfl. Nǝbābu kannatǝrgwāmew, Gǝʾǝz qǝnes, the monument of wisdom. Second part. Reading with interpretationʼ) (Addis Ababa: Bǝrhānǝnnā salām māttamiyā bet, 1991).
ʿĀmda Ṣəyon Tasammā 1970. የዚቅ፡ መጽሐፈ። (Ya-ziq maṣḥaf, ‘Book of the ziq’) (ʾAddis ʾAbabā: Tǝnśāʾe za-gubāʾe māttamiyā bet, 1970).

entry.citation: Электронный каталог эфиопских рукописей Российской национальной библиотеки (Elektronnyj katalog efiopskih rukopisej Rossijskoj nacionalnoj biblioteki) n.d.

reference.div: ‘Электронный каталог эфиопских рукописей Российской национальной библиотеки (Elektronnyj katalog efiopskih rukopisej Rossijskoj nacionalnoj biblioteki)’, n.d.
መልክአ ቅዱሳን በዐማርኛ 2020_2013. (Addis Ababa: ማኅበረ ቅዱሳን, 2020_2013).
Ḥasan al-Mašāṭ 1372. al-Ǧawāb al-mubīn fī tanbīh al-muslimīn wa taḥdīrihim min idḫāl awladihim dār al-kāfirīn wa madārs al-maġḍūb ʻalayihim wa lā al-ḍāllīn (al-Qāhira: Maṭbaʻat Miṣr, 1372).

Ḥasan al-ʻAdawī al-Ḥamzāwī 2010. Bulūġ al-masarrāt : šarḥ Dalā’il al-ḫayrāt wa-šawāriq al-anwār fī ḏikr al-ṣalāt ʻalā al-nabī al-muḫtār, ed. Aḥmad b. Farīd b. Aḥmad Mazīdī (al-Qāhira: Dār al-Āfāq al-ʻArabiyya, 2010).

entry.citation: Ḥaǧǧī Ḫalīfa, Mullā Kātib al-Ǧalabī (Kâtip Çelebi) 1941–1943

reference.div: Ḥaǧǧī Ḫalīfa, Mullā Kātib al-Ǧalabī (Kâtip Çelebi) 1941–1943. Kašf al-ẓunūn ʻan asāmī al-kutub wa al-funūn, eds Kilisli Mualim Rifat and Muāammad Šaraf al-Dīn Yāltaqāyā (M. Serefettin Yaltakaya) ([Istanbul]: Maarıf Matbaası, 1941–1943).

entry.citation: Ḥifnī Bek Nāsif et al. S. A.

reference.div: Ḥifnī Bek Nāsif, Muḥammad Bek Diyāb, Muṣtafā Ṭammūm, and Maḥmūd Efendī S. A. Kitāb Qawāʻid al-luġa al-ʻarabiyya (S. L: S. A.).

Ḥifnī Bey Nāṣif, Muḥammad Bey Diyab, Muḥammad Bey Ṣāliḥ, and Muṣṭafā Tamمūm 1923. Kitāb al-durūs al-naḥwiyya li-talāmīḏ al-madāris al-ibtidā’iyya - al-Kitāb al-ṯāliṯ, ed. Wizārat al-Maʻārif - Šams al-Dīn al-Inbābī (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Amiriyya, 1923).
Ḥikmat Šaḫānšīr and Kamāl Ḥarb 1966. al-Daʻwa al-ḥaqq (Bayrūt: Maṭabʻat al-Naǧwā, 1966).
Ḥusayn b. ʻAbd Allāh Bāsalāma 1969. Ḥayāt Sayyid al-ʻarab wa-ta’rīḫ al-nahḍa al-islāmiyya maʻa al-ʻilm wa-al-madaniyya (1969).
Ḥusayn b. Ḥabīb Ibn Ādam 2003. Tawḍīḥ al-marām wa-masraḥ al-afhām : šarḥ Tanbīh al-anām fī al-ṣalāt ʻalā ḫayr al-anām (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 2003).

entry.citation: Ḥusayn b. Ḥabīb b. Ādam al-Warrahibanī al-Ḥanafī and Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-Makkī al-Ḥanafī 1430

reference.div: Ḥusayn b. Ḥabīb b. Ādam al-Warrahibanī al-Ḥanafī and Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-Makkī al-Ḥanafī 1430. Muhimmat al-šarīfa fī šarḥ al-Muqaddima al-Laṭīfa (Addis Ababa: Maktabat mu’assasat al-naǧāšī, 1430).

entry.citation: Ḥusayn b. Ḥabīb b. Ādam al-Warrahibanī al-Ḥanafī and Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-Makkī al-Ḥanafī 1434

reference.div: Ḥusayn b. Ḥabīb b. Ādam al-Warrahibanī al-Ḥanafī and Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-Makkī al-Ḥanafī 1434. Muhimmat al-šarīfa fī šarḥ al-Muqaddima al-Laṭīfa (2), ed. Muḥammad Zayn al-Arbāṭāmī (Addis Ababa: Maktabat mu’assasat al-naǧāšī, 1434).
Ḥusayn Ḥasan al-Ṭamāwī s.a. al-Mawrid al-raḥmānī fī radd ḥuṣūl al-amānī (al-Qāhira: Dār Ṭibāʻat al-Ittiḥād al-Šarqī, s.a.).

entry.citation: Ḫadīǧa bt. Aḥmad Fāll b. Muḥammadar b. Aḥmad al-Šinqīṭī 1355

reference.div: Ḫadīǧa bt. Aḥmad Fāll b. Muḥammadar b. Aḥmad al-Šinqīṭī 1355. al-Sayf al-yamānī fī al-ḏabb ʻan šayḫinā Aḥmad al-Tiǧānī wa radd hafawāt al-munkir al-ǧānī (al-Qāhira: Dār Ṭibāʻa al-Sāda al-Ašrāf al-Tīǧāniyya - ʻAbd al-Karīm al-ʻAṭṭā al-Tiǧānī, 1355).

Ḫayla Giyorgis 1964ec_1972ce. የነጋድራስ፡ አፈወርቅ፡ ገብረ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ዘጌ፡ የሕይወት፡ ታሪክ (Yanaggādrās ʾAfawarq Gabra ʾIyasus zabǝḥera Zage yahǝywat tārik, ’Biography of ʾAfawarq Gabra ʾIyasus of Zage’) (Addis Ababa: 1964ec_1972ce).

Ḫayr al-Dīn al-Ziriklī 1986. al-Aʻlām: qāmūs tarāǧim, vol. 2 Iftiḫār-Danānīr (Bayrūt: Dār al-ʻilm lil-malāyīn, 1986).

Ḫeruy Walda Śellāsē 1980. Die Geschichte von Šawā (Äthiopien) 1700-1865: nach dem Tārika Nagaśt des belāttēn gētā Ḫeruy Walda Śellāsē, tr. Asfa-Wossen Asserate, Studien zur Kulturkunde, 53 (Wiesbaden: Franz Steiner Verlag GmbH, 1980).
Ḫuḍarī and Ibn ʻAqīl 1932. Ḥāšiyat Muḥammad al-Ḫuḍarī (2) ʻalā Šarḥ Ibn ʻAqīl ʻalā Alfiyyat Ibn Mālik... wa-bi-hāmišihi al-šarḥ al-maḏkūr (Cairo: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Azhariyya, 1932).
Ḫālid Muḥammad Ḫālid 1999. Riǧāl ḥawla al-Rasūl (Bayrūt: Dār al-Kutub al-ʻIlmiyya, 1999).

Ḫālid Muḥammad Ḫālid n.d. Wa-ǧā’a Abū Bakr (al-Qāhira: Dār Ṯābit / al-Mamlaka al-ʻarabiyya al-Saʻūdiyya: Wizārat al-Maʻārif: al-Mudīriyya al-ʻāmma li-al-abḥāṯ wa-al-manāhiǧ wa-al-mawādd al-taʻlīmiyya, ).
Ḫǝruy Wäldä Śǝllase 1917. ኢትዮጵያና፡ መተማ፡ የአፄ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ታሪክ፡ ባጭሩ (Ityoṗyanna mätämma yäʾaḍe Yoḥannǝs tarik bač̣č̣ǝru, ʻEthiopia and Mätämma: a short history of Aḍe Yoḥannəsʼ) (Addis Abäba: ??, 1917).
Ḫǝruya ʾƎrmǝyās 2007. መጽሐፈ፡ መቅድመ፡ ዘአባ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ዘጋሥጫ፡ (Maṣḥafa mǝśṭir zaʾAbbā Giyorgis zaGaśǝč̣č̣ā, ‘The Book of Mystery of Abba Giyorgis of Gaśǝč̣č̣ā’) (Addis Ababa: Alem Printing House, 2007).
Ṭabbārah, ʻAfīf ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ 1969. Rūḥ al-dīn al-islāmī (Bayrūt: Dār al-ʻIlm li’l-Malāyyin, 1969).

entry.citation: ʻAbd al-Munʻim ʻIwaḍ al-Ǧirǧāwī and Muḥammad Quṭṭa al-ʻAdawī 1914

reference.div: ʻAbd al-Munʻim ʻIwaḍ al-Ǧirǧāwī and Muḥammad Quṭṭa al-ʻAdawī 1914. Šarḥ šawāhid Ibn ʻAqīl ʻalā Alfiyyat Ibn Mālik li’l-ʻālim ... ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Ǧirǧāwī ... wa bi-hāmišihi Fatḥ al-ǧalīl bi-šarḥ šawāhid Ibn ʻAqīl li’l-ʻAllāma ... Qَuṭṭa al-ʻAdawī (al-Qāhira: al-Maṭbaʻa al-Azhariyya, 1914).
Martin van Bruinessen 1990. ‘Kitab Kuning: Books in Arabic Script used in the Pesantren Milieu’, in Bijdragen tot de Taal, -Land- en Volkenkunde, 146, 226–69.
